name: Krishun Hudson
text: The staff and manager are always very friendly and keeps a smile on their faces. Always feel welcome everytime. Also, the food is always made with fresh ingredients and always on time. If anyone does have a problem, they take care of and your issues with no hesitation. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo Al is absolutely the best. We love our Hut!!!

name: Otis Geystan
text: I try my best to give Pizza Hut my service but every time there is a problem. My food showed up cold because as the driver said “Someone didn’t put the wings in the bag with the pizza, so he had to go back to the store to get them”. After waiting almost two hours I called just to be told “there’s no orders on the table it should be on the way”. Still didn’t get everything I paid for. The only reason they got one star is because the delivery driver was cool even though he had to deliver in the rain. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo needs new management. I know it was the manager that answered the phone and customer service isn’t for her.

name: Christian Buckner
text: No masks, requested curbside and waited 10 min before going inside as no employees were looking outside. Not busy. Food was great.

name: Courtney Baugh
text: I have attempted to give this location so many chances. Literally the worst Pizza Hut I have used. This last time I ordered delivery and got a call that their delivery guy didn’t show and it would be 3 before they had a driver. Mind you this whole call the lady was so rude about the situation. I load up the kids to go pick up my order I walk in she doesn’t even ask who I am just grabs $3 from the drawer and hands me pizza. Again I never even told her my name so I could have been anyone. And then I witnessed her being extremely rude to an elderly gentleman that was ordering. After the man order he kindly let her know that they were going to sit in the car and she shrugs her shoulders and says AND I DONT CARE. Also the pizza had a weird aftertaste that tasted like alcohol.

name: Jazzy L
text: The staff is rude especially the people who work on the phones. My pizza and pasta is always dry carry out or delivery. They don’t have their curbside pickup sign up. -12/10 on customer service. -50/100 for food quality.

name: Kristy Edwards
text: I did curb side pick up. I called when I got there and they told me it would be two minutes. I waited 15 minutes before trying to call again. No one answered so I got out and went in and my food had been sitting in the warmer the whole time. This store is understaffed. The food was delicious but the service was bad.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Susie Smith
text: This location does an awesome job!  The delivery driver was nice and the pizza was great.

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

name: Squeakyyr 4 Brown
text: None of the employees wore gloves or mask...

name: Erick Shields
text: Great atmosphere and very affable service. The meals were crisp and yummy. Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family. Affordable prices and large portions. Great job.

name: Harold Hickman
text: This place is worth giving a shot. They have big portions for convenient rates. Always clean and with fantastic character. Will visit here again.

name: Shawn Romanstine
text: Ordered online 2 medium speciality and recv 1 cheese and 1 sausage but was charged for speciality. The person working said I got what I ordered. Ok but why did I pay for what I didn't get? The 2nd time in a row my order was wrong!!! Now to the top!

name: Kolton Buck
text: I simply like their food. I always get great customer service there. The place is clean and the staff members are always helpful. I highly recommend this place.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time

name: keepcoolalive
text: Pretty sure I’ve gotten sick the last two times I’ve eaten here. Completely strengthened my fear of getting food from anywhere other than MY kitchen.

name: sonido pachuko king
text: Terrible service, they don't know how to place an order and rude manager has NO professionalism

name: Zac Copeland
text: Can't ever get instructions right, such as a regular Dr.Pepper not a Diet, can't seem to remember to put the garlic crust flavor on a stuffed crust pizza, brought a sierra mist the other day when asked for Mt. Dew. Its the simple things really.

name: Stephanie Thacker
text: Absurd service! Waited over an hour AFTER the pizza was out for delivery. They forgot our drink. When we called, the manager was rude and wouldn’t contact the delivery driver to bring one. So we asked just to be credited the couple dollars for it. They charged my card without asking an extra $10 because it “changed the special” without the drink that THEY forgot. So I paid $49 for 2 cold pizzas. I’ll stick to papa Johns from now on.

name: s8vy15
text: Went in earlier today and placed an order for our youth football team. We ordered 6 pizzas and stressed they needed to be delievered there at a certain time and was told they would be. Called for 15 minutes to FINALLY have the actual store answer to tell us our order was still sitting in the store at the time they were SUPPOSED to be delivered and waiting on a driver. Really this was PRE ORDERED!!!  This is ridiculous the way their service is.

name: Randy Hatcher
text: Ordered pizza got home only half toppings on it plus IT WAS burnt so bad it was black no sauce on it at all call up there talked to TOM the manager and was told I have to drive back 15 mins 1 way to fix there problem and the guy told me oh well it is what it is. Ya never again will i do business with them.

name: Deanna Davenport
text: Terrible service. Ordered a simple pizza over the phone, got to business after 30 mins and they had my number saved and NO pizza. Had to "reorder" and still tried to charge full price with no apologies of the long wait!

name: Michael Patton
text:
Mobile app wouldn't let me cancel a double-clicked order which would have cost 10.90.  Called and they got light sauce confused with extra sauce.  The cost was 12.46.  Got home to a pizza I didn't eat but two bites of.

I won't ever order via phone again.  Hope the app works better someday.

name: Corey Baginski
text:
Had been ordering delivery from here for quite a while. Called in my order tonight and was told they didn't have any delivery drivers. On a Saturday night. There must be something wrong with either what they pay, or whoever answered the phone didn't give a $#!+.
Please remove the delivery option from your website.
Thank you, Domino's, for delivering.

name: Joey Icolano
text: Love the new location!  Fast friendly service.  Great value from the $5 Flavor Menu

name: Whit Russell
text: This place is been doing very good pizza in town for a very long time. They moved to a new location a couple of years ago, but it's the same franchise.

name: Robin Simmons
text: I enjoyed the convenience of ordering online. Pizza hut in Montevallo did a wonderful job. The service was great and the food was delicious!

name: R B
text: Ordered three pizzas, all three were over cooked, all three pizzas were not cut all the way through and very difficult to cut. I had my elderly father pick up the pizza due me being ill and needing to feed the kids. My dad didn’t look at the pizza or didn’t realize how over cooked it was and he had no way of knowing about the pizzas not being cut through. Regardless it should have not been served to customers. I called to address the issue the manger did not apologize once, in fact he sounded like he didn’t care at all. He just offered a credit for one pizza. I was suppose to have a credit from their last mess up, but didn’t push it and wanted to give them another try when placing the order. Whoever is in charge at the moment is doing a terrible job.

name: Mustang Concepts
text:
Worst EVER!!! Ordered pizza, waited 101 minutes for said pizza to arrive. Needless to say the pies  resembled cardboard wheels with cheese. As for the bread sticks, well they would have served a better purpose as rubber chew toys for the pooch!! I called the store and waited 27 minutes to speak to a manager, only to have the phone hung up by some over achieving pizza clerk who didn't even bother to check if someone was on the line. HELLOOOOOOO!!!!!!!.
YOU CANT FIX STUPID and for a college town, there sure are a LOT of IGNORANT people here!!!

name: Kathy Hughes
text: Pizza is soggy. Has large chunks of green peppers.The cinnamon bread is good and the delivery drive was nice.

name: Taylor Coe
text: Terrible. Used to work there and it’s only gone downhill. Had a two and a half hour wait for just wings and fries. Would have picked it up but the woman on the phone claimed my number didn’t work. I don’t even like the pizza, but the wings are much better than Dominoes.

name: Dinki Wheeler
text: Good service hot food just the calzones had barely any meat or cheese

name: Mary Bullard
text: Tonight was awful. Ordered a BBQ beef pizza and got delivered a pizza with bbq sauce an cheese. Called back up there an was put on hold because they were cleaning up. So.i pulled up at 9:58 an they were supposed to close at 10.. sorry but yall bout to make me the correct pizza. The manager Tracy was very rude she was from the prattville pizza hut.

text: If zero/negative stars was an option that’s what they’d get

PIZZA HUT IS AWEFULL.
THE PRICE GOES UP AND THE AMOUNT OF TOPPINGS GOES DOWN.
WE ORDER HALF EVERYTHING AND THERE IS BARELY ANYTHING

GO TO JENNY CAN COOK AND FIND HER PIZZA CRUST RECIEPE   IT IS FAST AND DELISH
ANYTHING IS BETTER THAN THIS POS PIZZA PLACE

name: s8vy15
text: Went in earlier today and placed an order for our youth football team. We ordered 6 pizzas and stressed they needed to be delievered there at a certain time and was told they would be. Called for 15 minutes to FINALLY have the actual store answer to tell us our order was still sitting in the store at the time they were SUPPOSED to be delivered and waiting on a driver. Really this was PRE ORDERED!!!  This is ridiculous the way their service is.

name: Randy Hatcher
text: Ordered pizza got home only half toppings on it plus IT WAS burnt so bad it was black no sauce on it at all call up there talked to TOM the manager and was told I have to drive back 15 mins 1 way to fix there problem and the guy told me oh well it is what it is. Ya never again will i do business with them.

name: Deanna Davenport
text: Terrible service. Ordered a simple pizza over the phone, got to business after 30 mins and they had my number saved and NO pizza. Had to "reorder" and still tried to charge full price with no apologies of the long wait!

name: Michael Patton
text:
Mobile app wouldn't let me cancel a double-clicked order which would have cost 10.90.  Called and they got light sauce confused with extra sauce.  The cost was 12.46.  Got home to a pizza I didn't eat but two bites of.

I won't ever order via phone again.  Hope the app works better someday.

name: Corey Baginski
text:
Had been ordering delivery from here for quite a while. Called in my order tonight and was told they didn't have any delivery drivers. On a Saturday night. There must be something wrong with either what they pay, or whoever answered the phone didn't give a $#!+.
Please remove the delivery option from your website.
Thank you, Domino's, for delivering.

name: R B
text: Ordered three pizzas, all three were over cooked, all three pizzas were not cut all the way through and very difficult to cut. I had my elderly father pick up the pizza due me being ill and needing to feed the kids. My dad didn’t look at the pizza or didn’t realize how over cooked it was and he had no way of knowing about the pizzas not being cut through. Regardless it should have not been served to customers. I called to address the issue the manger did not apologize once, in fact he sounded like he didn’t care at all. He just offered a credit for one pizza. I was suppose to have a credit from their last mess up, but didn’t push it and wanted to give them another try when placing the order. Whoever is in charge at the moment is doing a terrible job.

I called the store and waited 27 minutes to speak to a manager, only to have the phone hung up by some over achieving pizza clerk who didn't even bother to check if someone was on the line. HELLOOOOOOO!!!!!!!.
YOU CANT FIX STUPID and for a college town, there sure are a LOT of IGNORANT people here!!!

name: Kathy Hughes
text: Pizza is soggy. Has large chunks of green peppers.The cinnamon bread is good and the delivery drive was nice.

name: Taylor Coe
text: Terrible. Used to work there and it’s only gone downhill. Had a two and a half hour wait for just wings and fries. Would have picked it up but the woman on the phone claimed my number didn’t work. I don’t even like the pizza, but the wings are much better than Dominoes.

name: Krishun Hudson
text: The staff and manager are always very friendly and keeps a smile on their faces. Always feel welcome everytime. Also, the food is always made with fresh ingredients and always on time. If anyone does have a problem, they take care of and your issues with no hesitation. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo Al is absolutely the best. We love our Hut!!!

name: Otis Geystan
text: I try my best to give Pizza Hut my service but every time there is a problem. My food showed up cold because as the driver said “Someone didn’t put the wings in the bag with the pizza, so he had to go back to the store to get them”. After waiting almost two hours I called just to be told “there’s no orders on the table it should be on the way”. Still didn’t get everything I paid for. The only reason they got one star is because the delivery driver was cool even though he had to deliver in the rain. The Pizza Hut in Montevallo needs new management. I know it was the manager that answered the phone and customer service isn’t for her.

name: Christian Buckner
text: No masks, requested curbside and waited 10 min before going inside as no employees were looking outside. Not busy. Food was great.

name: Courtney Baugh
text: I have attempted to give this location so many chances. Literally the worst Pizza Hut I have used. This last time I ordered delivery and got a call that their delivery guy didn’t show and it would be 3 before they had a driver. Mind you this whole call the lady was so rude about the situation. I load up the kids to go pick up my order I walk in she doesn’t even ask who I am just grabs $3 from the drawer and hands me pizza. Again I never even told her my name so I could have been anyone. And then I witnessed her being extremely rude to an elderly gentleman that was ordering. After the man order he kindly let her know that they were going to sit in the car and she shrugs her shoulders and says AND I DONT CARE. Also the pizza had a weird aftertaste that tasted like alcohol.

name: Jazzy L
text: The staff is rude especially the people who work on the phones. My pizza and pasta is always dry carry out or delivery. They don’t have their curbside pickup sign up. -12/10 on customer service. -50/100 for food quality.

name: Kristy Edwards
text: I did curb side pick up. I called when I got there and they told me it would be two minutes. I waited 15 minutes before trying to call again. No one answered so I got out and went in and my food had been sitting in the warmer the whole time. This store is understaffed. The food was delicious but the service was bad.

name: Dericc Williams
text: Bad attitudes rude and the owner must not care about their store ...how do you order extra cheese and get more cheese without asking for extra..when you have people working jst too get a check and don't understand that if your costumers are not happy you don't get a check and your store closes like the others

name: Courtney Sparks
text: So all of my food was great, but i ordered bread sticks with an extra marinara. Both marinara cups were barely filled, i poured both of them together and didnt even have half the container filled. Other than that the food was good and the customer service was great. Just feel like i shouldnt of had to pay for an extra sauce that literally had a tablespoons worth in the cup.

text: Great atmosphere and very affable service. The meals were crisp and yummy. Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family. Affordable prices and large portions. Great job.

name: Harold Hickman
text: This place is worth giving a shot. They have big portions for convenient rates. Always clean and with fantastic character. Will visit here again.

name: Shawn Romanstine
text: Ordered online 2 medium speciality and recv 1 cheese and 1 sausage but was charged for speciality. The person working said I got what I ordered. Ok but why did I pay for what I didn't get? The 2nd time in a row my order was wrong!!! Now to the top!

name: Kolton Buck
text: I simply like their food. I always get great customer service there. The place is clean and the staff members are always helpful. I highly recommend this place.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time

text: Pretty sure I’ve gotten sick the last two times I’ve eaten here. Completely strengthened my fear of getting food from anywhere other than MY kitchen.

text: Great food and great service. I haven't had any issues. Consistently hot, fresh, delicious food.

name: Jason Gilbert
text: Go get a frozen pizza instead, don't waste your money at this dominos.The only good thing about this place is when it's closed.

name: Matt St. John
text: We have repeatedly had problems with this particular store.  Tonight, we tried calling from various phones for over an hour.  They didn't even bother to answer.  I would hate to know that I was too lazy or ignorant to know how to answer a phone call at a business that offers delivery.  This is the WORST dominos we have ever dealt with and we won't bother with them again.

name: Matt Qualls
text: Best costumer service ever!! Have yet to be disappointed all around!

name: Eric Wilson
text: The best buffalo chicken pizzas ever.

name: Brad Bell
text: Awesome store with great service

name: Reba Phillips
text: Great Quality Pizzas with Delicious Toppings. Crispy Base is my Favorite and they made that really good. Awesome staff always their to help. When i went inn This place was Rushed by People but they Served me my pizza in just 20min. Surely Visit again.

name: Coonass
text: Good pizza, bad location. I'd eat there again.

name: Jesse Dalton
text: Crust was outstanding. Toppings and cheese in good proportion. Sauce on the pizza was good. The marinara that came with the Calzone wasn't what I expected. It was like a cross between marinara and hot sauce. I'm not sure this was intended, but it gave a unique bite to it. All in all it was a pretty outstanding shop, they sell by the slice, so make a great lunch option.

name: Elizabeth Gardner
text: OMG I'VE BEEN EATING HERE FOR YEARS AND I'VE NEVER BEEN DISSATISFIED. THE FOOD SO AWESOME AND THE MAN THAT RUNS THE PLACE HAS GOT TO BE THE NICEST PERSON I KNOW💛💛💛💛💛 LOVE IT

text: I've definitely had better calzones.

text: Really? Can deliver to a motel but won't deliver to the Pilot Truck stop right up the road. Their loss.

name: Christopher LaRocca
text:
Anything less than a five star is ridiculous. This is the best pizza on the island (Sorry mama lotties, I had genuine love for you).

This is a tiny kitchen, close staff- family owned. BE PATIENT WITH THEM.

Quality ingredients, delicious thin crust pizza. You can tell it's fresh.

name: Paige Chiaro
text: This pizza place was great! They're conveniently located,  the pizza is delicious,  and their open until 11pm (though I think sign said during summer open until midnight). Several other local pizza places close by 9pm which in my opinion is way too early near the beach.

resp.text: Our summer hours we are open from 11am to 11pm Monday through Thursday, Friday and Saturday from 11am to Midnight, and Sunday Noon to 10pm.

name: Kim Parker
text: I'm not a big pizza fan but the family is. This place is awesome. I loved their veggie pizza with pepperoni. We ordered 3 times during our stay. The crust is super thin and crunchy! Very happy family from Ohio!

name: Gheymarne
text: Surfside Pizza & Ice Cream was good. Its pizza crust was quite delicious. The staff was amazing and patient. Full of suggestions and extremely bubbly. I think this place may do well in the area. The pizza sauce had a good taste. SURFSIDE PIZZA & ICE CREAM is a quality place. That's all the good stuff. I didn't like that the toppings were so much. Cheese pizza was $10.00. When adding toppings it can get quite expensive. I suggest going with a specialty pizza to avoid that. Toppings were $1.50 each. Nice environment and family friendly. Right across from parking and public beach access.

name: Justin Williams
text: This was the best pizza my family and I have ever had. They are generous with toppings and the flavor is amazing. We are here on day 3 of vacation and have had it twice. We will most likely be eating it again, too. The staff is super nice and the turn around for your order being ready is quick.  I HIGHLY recommend this place!

name: Sylvia Turner
text: Pizza was hot and fresh! Ice cream was amazing! Your staff are friendly and smiley and we all around had an amazing experience! Thanks guys!

name: Clara Baumer
text: i absolutely adored surf side pizza. the food was pretty good but what truly made my experience was a gorgeous and quirky worker. i believe her name was carolina? if you go to surf side, make sure to have her scoop your ice cream. you truly will not regret it. she’s amazing❤️‍🔥

name: King Vol
text: Pizza was great. On vacation and ate Lamberts for lunch. Just wanted smaller dinner.  This pizza hit the spot. Delivery was prompt, and driver was super nice.  A great experience while in a unknown area.  I highly recommend surf side while vacationing in gulf shores, orange beach

name: Brandon Clayton
text: Hands down the best Buffalo Chicken Pizza we’ve EVER had!!!!

name: Alicia McMilleon
text: Me and my son walked here from our condo. What a wonderful surprise!! I can tell you that we didn’t expect how good it was. We inadvertently gave them a challenge with our order but they delivered! We got a 14” with half of my sons toppings and half of mine. Two toppings on one side and four on the other, but it was cooked perfectly on both sides! It really hit the spot and got us ready to hit the beach again, with a full bully and a face full of smiles. Can’t wait to try it again!

name: Hailey Felkins
text: We ordered a large all meat pizza and garlic Parmesan wings. This is one of the only places in Gulf Shores that is open late but is delicious. The staff was super sweet it was almost time for them to close but they didn’t mind if we sat and ate at the restaurant while they closed. I highly recommend and will definitely be back on our next trip.

name: Bob Roberts
text: I was in there a couple nights ago to give the place a try. Pizza was good, place was kinda small with pretty decent beach feel to it. The employees were friendly and provided good service. I would give them a 5 star. The main reason I gave the place a 1 star is because of the manager. As we were eating one of the people in the kitchen must have made a mistake. The manager, I am guessing or maybe the owner as he was really the only adult in the place, started screaming and cussing at the staff. This in its self made an unpleasant experience and I will never return because of it. I really felt bad for the young people that work under those conditions.

resp.text:
We regret you had a negative experience.
We value our work force, and we strive to always maintain a happy kitchen.  The situation you spoke of was handled poorly.  We have used this review to educate our staff on how to communicate more proactively.  Thank you for bringing this concern to us.

name: Kristina
text: Delicious pizza, wings and ice cream!  Fast and friendly service.  Love the outdoor eating as an option.

name: Samantha Miller
text: I’d give it a -10 if i could. We are not from around here, and we’ve been at the beach all day and have small children. I made a delivery order at 6:00 on the dot and was told 45 mins. We are ONE MILE from this place. 1 hour and 15 minutes passed and still no pizza. I called at 7:15 and they said 20 minutes and it was already in route. . 45 minutes passed still no pizza…. I called and asked for a manger after two hours of wait… he was very rude, and didn’t apologize and was not informative at all… pizza showed 15 minutes later and was very cold and did not have much of a taste. HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND. Absolutely terrible customer service and experience.

resp.text: We have read your review and taken steps to address what happened.  We apologize and hope you give us another chance to win you back as a customer.  Your next pizza is on the house!

name: Micah Ermert
text: Me and my mom are on vacation and wanted a quick bit to eat. It was absolutely perfect for that. Food is fantastic and service was very very nice

name: Amanda Alviso
text: Just arrived to the beach after a 2 day drive and a family of 4 was starving. Called to get delivery and they said 45min. After an hour and 15 min I called to check on status because the kids were starving! I was told it was on its way. Within a few min it arrived ( of course) but the driver parked in the wrong condos so I had to reach across a hedge to get our pizza. It was bland and burnt on all the edges and of course the kids were disappointed! They rated it a 1 but I figured I would give it at least a 2 for effort! We will not be eating here again nor will recommend it to anyone in the future

resp.text: Sounds like a very unfortunate situation.  We strive hard to meet our delivery deadlines.  We apologize for the confusion, and we hope you will give us another try in the future.

name: Ciara
text: Had a few ice cream flavor options to pick from, nothing overly exciting. Kinda pricey at $4.50 for a scoop in a cup. The pizza was not good, it looked like cafeteria food. There was a 30 minute wait for it, but someone else in my party brought one back to our house. Glad I grabbed pizza somewhere else.

name: John Devericks
text: Awesome place for pizza and ice cream. We ate here twice on our trip and both times it was great.

name: Dat Boi COZ
text: Service was outstanding. Best chicken,bacon,ranch pizza I've ever had!

name: Kevin
text: Great Pizza! Went in one night for ice cream but the pizza smelled incredible! We went back the next night to try the pizza and it didn't disappoint!

name: Stephanie McBride

text: This was a good place to go. Normal wait time for pick up. The crust is delicious. The workers pleasant.   The pizza is thin crust so buy an extra.  We had 3 pizza for 9 people.  It wasn’t enough. 14 inch is small. Our fault not theirs.

Great pizza and love their ice cream!! 😋

name: Craig Craver
text: One of the best pizzas I have ever had.  We WILL order from here again when we are back in Gulf Shores.

name: Jason Mullikin
text: Ordered their help me ronda, absolutely fantastic. Being a New Yorker, this pizza took me home. I wish I found this place sooner, will definitely be back for the years to come

resp.text: Thumbs Up! :)

name: Nick
text: Expect crazy wait times on the weekends during prime time.  45 minute expectation set.  Took 2 hours.  From a business standpoint, a bigger kitchen or higher prices may alleviate this.

resp.text: Our wait time was crazy!  It was our first Memorial Day Weekend for our pizza place and honestly we were not prepared for that level of business.  We have revamped things and set up some new systems to speed things up in the kitchen, and to give our customers a more accurate wait time.  Hopefully, next time you visit you will be pleasantly surprised.  Thank your for your input.  We strive to be the best pizza place on the island!

text: This place has the best pizza I have ever ate in South Alabama

name: Lilly D
text: Delicious thin crust pizza! Extremely Fast service, our pizza was ready when we arrived even though we were a little bit early. The other pizza places we called had over a 3 hour wait. It was only 30 minutes here.

name: Mary Jane Lewis
text: Thin crust pizza is delicious! The Braided Breadsticks are amazing! Prices are reasonable. Food was ready in the time frame I was given. Employees seem very friendly.

name: Anonymous
text:
On vacation in gulf shores and just ordered pizza from here and it was TERRIBLE. We paid 60 bucks for 3 pizzas and it was the biggest waste of money. Everyone is disappointed, better off offering from dominoes. Pizza was dry, tasted like cardboard, chewy, hardly any cheese...... like I said terrible.
Save your money and don’t order pizza from here. You’re better off being hungry than going to Surfside.

resp.text: Anonymous, are you sure you have the right pizza place?  We are super generous with our cheese toppings and we use only fresh cut  ingredients and the highest quality crust.  This whole review sounds a bit dubious, and as noted, comes from an "anonymous" source.  We take the quality, freshness, and taste of our pizza very serious.  Even more important, we value our customers.  Had this person contacted us directly we would have refunded them and researched what happened to make it right.  As it stands now, we are left to defend an "anonymous" one star review that we don't even know is legit. :(

name: Amy B
text: Fabulous pizza! And the ice cream is good too! So glad they opened up close to our condo!!!

name: Colten Wilcox (Q)
text: We didn't have ice cream, however the pizza and bread sticks here were extremely delicious. The staff were incredibly nice and catering, and the seating at the building was nice, especially at night.

name: Hunter Hanson
text: BEST PIZZA EVER. From Dallas. come here every year. This place is amazing🤙🏽

name: Barbara V

text: Delicious thin crust pizza.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Ice cream was great as well.  Overall excellent experience.

walk. Ordered  for pick up and it was hot and ready at pick up time. Thin crust. I recommend the large kokomo and breadstick braids. Awesome people. Liked it so much we walked back for ice cream.

resp.text: We had a freak swarm of gnats fly through our doorway last night.  All we can figure is a down pour of rain spooked them inside.  It was a very strange and freak thing.  They never got as far as the kitchen.  We cleaned everything and dealt with the situation.  To give a 2 star review for this act of nature if kind of unfair, but I can certainly understand how the optics looked the moment it happened.

text: Sat at the window for at least 5 minutes with no sign of anyone in the store at all. Finally pulled off and someone drove up behind me and someone came right to the window. Not sure if they just didn't hear when I pulled up but they should at least check for customers every couple minutes if they aren't going to be in the front area. The pizza was really good and the guy who took my order was nice. He saw my baby crying when he brought out the pizza and told me to hang on a second and he ran inside and got him a couple packs of cookies. That was really sweet.

text: Wow, I was pleasantly surprised to find new people working here. Store was clean and employees spoke to you with a smile. When bread sticks didn't rise properly, I was told about the issue and not just find out later. Manager even asked if I had the time to wait for another batch to finish, at no charge. Happy to see a difference.

text: Voted best value eating several years in a row. Fresh, hot pizza for cary out. Experienced employees make for high quality, accurate orders. The drive through is an added bonus.

text: I would give it less than one star if I could. I don't know how much money I've spent here, but they have got my last dollar. Absolutely the worst service. The last several times I've tried to get pizzas, nothing was hot, fresh or ready to eat. The pizzas are poor quality, but even so if you had an $8 ready pizza, you'd sell them all day long. This franchise owner is losing thousands and thousands of dollars because just like me, multiple cars are pulling out of line hungry, pissed off and headed somewhere else to spend our money. There's no place thats still open in this town that has as bad a reputation. Good luck keeping the lights on.

We called Pizza Hut and they were more than happy to make the sell and to get a new customer.  It is a shame that your business does not want to keep their customers.

name: man of means by no means
text: Needs new management!!! I love the pizza. But sometimes it's an hour and a half before closing time and they say they're closed and not making any more pizza. Like literally it will be supposed to close at 11 On Friday night .according to the business hours on the door .and I get  there at 930.and nobody comes to the Window.i honk the horn.dude comes to the Window and goes "uhm were not making any more pizza tonight " .this happens all the effin time!!! Serious problem guys!!

name: Larry Beauchamp
text: When I drove up to the drive up window the buzzer sounded to alert the employees someone was at the window.  I waited a few minutes and backed up so the buzzer sounded again.  I did that once more and no one came.  At FIVE full minutes I called them. I told the person I had been at the window for five minutes.   She asked if no one had taken my order and I said no.  The manager,  who answered the phone,  stuck her head around the corner to see me and she was eating something.   Shortly someone came and took my order.  Poor, poor customer service and a bad way to run a business.

name: DJ Williams
text: I ordered a simple cheese pizza with breadsticks and marinara. They charged me for the Italian cheese bread. They told us there would be an 8-10 min wait on the pizza. We parked then I realized the breadsticks error so I went inside. I told Jerry J. of my issue with the receipt and he said ok then walked off in the back without further explanation. He started putting together my order as requested in front of me then I handed him the receipt. He looked at it then placed it back down without word and went to speak with a male in the back. He then returned stating that the manager is coming. Then Jerry walked off without ever saying another word or making eye contact the entire time I remained there. 28 minutes by the way after receiving the order for the manager to finally come to correct the charged receipt. During this time, he was filling pans with crusts. A female took about 3-4 drive thru orders then 3 orders were taken in store by her and Jerry.  One guy had to return a pizza that was given incorrectly to his wife earlier. The manager did come over to the register once, but next spoke with me or any of the other customers to inquire who had the issue. He then rushed off to grab pizzas after standing by the register ~3-5 mind awaiting the female processing drive thru orders. After pulling the pizzas, he began 2 other tasks including filling pans with crusts again. The female finally asked if had been helped and I stated no I haven't. She apologized and went to tell the manager again. He finally came back and began working with the register without saying a word. It took 3-5 mins of him tapping the register, shaking his head at it, to finally say that he voided it and required my card again. This was unnecessarily long and disregarded attending to the client who already paid versus the more recent customers who should have been put on hold until our order was corrected.

name: Ben Baggett
text: We don't have it anymore ☹️

We finally ordered one with cheese bread and it was well worth it. They sent a menu home with the food and after reading it, we decided to order a couple cheeseburgers a couple days later. It’s about $5 per burger but it’s made to order and they are so good! The menu is huge especially for a gas station, we WILL order again!!

resp.text: Thank you Caitlin. We appreciate your business. Your husband has good taste in pizza.

text: Good country folks!

name: Kevin Saint
text: Best Pizza around, has everything from BBQ to fish to chicken tenders and burgers. Delicious breakfast and everything a gas station should be. Free air, window cleaner, etc. Been locally owned and family operated for almost 30 years.

name: Susan Mruk
text: Saint Food Mart has a lot to offer its patrons. They are competitive with gas prices. Inside they serve breakfast sandwiches made to order. You can even get some tater tots to go with it.  They also serve a meat and three lunch with a good menu through the week with plenty of seating.  The staff is also very friendly and give great service!

name: Tonna Saunders
text: Great little Italian place. The stromboli is amazing, and my friend is addicted to their brushetta. Pizza fries, come on, you cant hate pizza toppings on waffle fries. They have pasta, sandwiches, they even have wings! Great place and the staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Stacey Suttles
text: My kids and I loved it! Pizza was so delicious and the Wings (Italian) were awesome. We'll definitely come back again and again!!!

resp.text: Thank you Stacey!

name: Thomas B
text: Ordered the Spinach and Feta Cheese Bread for an appetizer, along with the Eggplant Parm and the white lasagna florentine with chicken. Everything was very fresh and extremely tasty. The sauces were bright and full of flavor, and each item was clearly cooked right when we ordered it. Pizza dough was crazy good, maybe best in Tuscaloosa. Will be coming back.

resp.text: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure serving you today.

name: Traci Watkins
text: A friend and I had lunch here today for the first time.  It was delish!!  The portions were super large, the Greek salad dressing was really good and the salad was so fresh.  The chicken parmesan was delish as well.  Waiter was super friendly!  We will definitely be going back soon!

name: Narkeita Robert
text: This was my first time at Anthony's 10/24/15 and  I gave it three stars based on the food alone. The food was very good. However, that's where it stops.  The service was bad and the bathroom was nasty. Anthony's would be good for take out no more dining in.

name: Christopher Snell
text: Good food, friendly staff and timely service.

name: Akins Josh
text:
Went for lunch 9/9/15 approximately 1150.  It is a seat yourself place. That has its ups and downs.  Ups sit where you like, not where you are lead.  Down:  The server for that section may not know you are there.  After looking over the menu twice and discussing the options provided, roughly 10 mins; we got approached by the waitstaff for drinks.  The place was not very busy, but there were other folks there.  Got our order in. Eggplant Parm, the Italian, and order of cheese breadsticks.  It took a while for the chow to hit the table.  The Eggplant Parm was a big portion  looked really tasty.  The Italian  was wee for a 8-9 dollar sandwich, i would say less than 6 inches of it total.  The meat cuts were great though.  Cheese bread.... can't tell you just yet, as it has not arrived.  My side salad was fair.  The Greek dressing was really good.  However the onions were old as they had become translucent and the red had seeped into the meat of the veggie. My friend had to get up to get his tea refilled.  The waitress did not even acknowledge that she had not returned with his drink.  I scarfed up my sandwich after removing the onions.  Good, but not valued correctly in my opinion at the cost point.  When i had cleaned up my area, just a thing i do having been a server, my cheese breads arrived.  They came with an apology about a mix up in the kitchen. Things happen.  They were the best thing out of all that was ordered.

What this place needs to do to stay alive in a market flooded with food options :
*know that this place is new and are working on finding their rhythm

1.  Bring on better wait staff, and add another the floor
2.  Re-evaluate their price points on certain items.  There Special was a great deal!
3.  Polish the time from order to table.

I will be going back in a month or two to see how things have changed.  It has some great things going for it.  I fear that the simple things against it could keep first timers from coming back.

resp.text:
Hi Josh, thank you for your feedback. We have made some changes to our staff and changed the bread for the sandwich. It is a much better portion now. I hope you will try us again. As a new restaurant, we did have a few challenges but I feel confident that we are better now. If you have any questions or concerns, please call me at 523-7548.
Thank you again,
Tina

I bought two cheldas that read $1.69 and was charged $2.39ea then was told the prices were wrong then the guy gives me back a dollar. I just have an issue with the one dude he's always trying to get over on me. This isn't the first time but it will be the last.

name: Erin Defelippo
text: Be careful at this place at Jeff and Dawes. I used my card at the pump without thinking about it normal hurry hurry day for me. I managed to only have my card deactivated because the charge was more than 450$ and was done at Wal-mart the very same day (I dont do walmart I have panic attacks in there so small places like windixie it is for me). So  I went in and tried to explain to the clerk what happened since THAT was the last place I had used the card (no money on it until today after Aug 11) until today when I went to Circle K, and let him know that he may want to check the pumps and make sure everything is good. Guy looked at me like a deer caught in headlights......"u first problem" - Okay, but still its a good idea to go check it (His words to me where "Im too lazy" not "U first problem"). Apparently after talking to several people, I AM NOT the first person to have a problem with their card being skimmed at the pumps. I wanted to so badly scream at the guy putting gas in his car and pulling out his debit card "DONT DO IT!" but I didn't....I simply got in my own car and left.  Please make sure you ******check your pumps!********

name: Michelle Owens
text: If you're thinking of ordering pizza at the Domino's Pizza in Priceville, AL, you're better off ordering from somewhere else. My first encounter with them, I placed an online order 30 minutes before closing, & was told they couldn't complete my order, even though it showed online that they could. On top of that, I was STILL charged for my order...that I never received! Yeah...I'm not even joking. I received a phone call telling me they already closed off orders or something, but that my card had been charged. I was like..."Whaaattt??!!" How can I be charged for food I never received?? I mentioned that they didn't close until midnight, & he said that was correct, but because they don't "normally" get orders that late, they had already closed off orders or whatever he said. I guess he's never heard of people that work second shift?? So, now I'm out $22.00 & no food! Beware!

resp.text:
Michelle Owens
I am very sorry to hear about your experience.  We want to make this right.  Please email us at teamdaks.customercare@gmail.com so we can look into the matter.  Please include what store you shop with, your phone number and address so we can fully address this for you.

text: Just an awesome place to stop on your way home from work and grab a pizza. The pizza is always hot and fresh. This place deserves 5/5.

Richard Shepard
We work hard to earn your 5 star and seeing your review means everything to us. Your feedback will be used in in continued training at the store level as we strive to provide a great meal and service to our community.
THANK YOU!

Kevin Breuers
Thanks for choosing us and your review is very important. I apologize your experience was not at a 5 star level and I want to make things right. Can you email me at teamdaks.customercare@gmail.com when you have a moment so I know exactly what happened and how I can fix this?

I always call and order when I am in a different location and it never seems to be a problem to deliver to an 18-wheeler. All the other location I have gone to in Alabama do not have a problem with.   What a waste of time to call this place or even order from them.

name: Jason Sharitt
text:
Used the app to place an order at 6:44 Saturday evening from a house party. Socialized with friends for a while and saw two missed calls a few minutes later at 6:53. No voicemails but I figured it had to be Domino’s so I called back. Waited for 10 minutes and no one picked up. App said pizza was being delivered. Called back at 7:26 to see where food was. Finally got someone on the phone. The gentleman said he tried calling twice to tell me there were no delivery drivers available. But he could’ve left a voicemail for that! Why did I have to try and call him back for that information? At this point we’re all hungry and now the guests are upset.

So a few things here:
1. The app shouldn’t show my food is being delivered when it hasn’t even been made.
2. I shouldn’t have been able to order delivery if the location doesn’t offer it.
3. The employee should have left a voicemail with the information and not wasted my time trying to call back for it.

So be careful using this location. The communication is very poor. Call ahead of time to see if they can deliver. Don’t use the app.

EDIT: Bumping up a star since the manager called me to explain the situation and obviously wants to make things right. I may give this location another try since it seems I caught them in a perfect storm of "things going wrong", and being a former restaurant worker myself, I can sympathize.

My order was flagged for review since it was associated to an address that has been linked to multiple phone numbers. This is a national Domino's corporate policy to keep tabs on potential sketchy orders.

Domino's corporate always expects their franchisees to have delivery drivers, and never anticipates a scenario where a given store has no delivery drivers show up for work. So don't expect the app design to improve, and I can't fault this location for that.

Domino's typically doesn't leave voicemails as they prefer to talk about potential order problems in person, and in my case, try to present an offer for me to pick up the pizza myself. Even so, we'll agree to disagree as the voicemail could have said "We have no delivery drivers for tonight. Please call us back by X time if you still want the order and can arrange to have it picked up."

resp.text: Our team appreciates your review and feedback. We apologize for not earning a 5-star review from you and want you to know we will be working hard to earn your 5-star review from you. Thank you and have a great day, Jason!

After I called to check on my pizza, she said I needed to place my order again online since she couldn’t apply my coupon over the phone. She told me they now had a driver, and it would be delivered. I order my pizza again and the tracker says it has been delivered. 30 minutes later- still no pizza. I was left on hold for 20 minutes or so and called back several times with no answer. I love dominos, but I hate to say I won’t be ordering from this store anymore. Save your money!!

text:
Had a heck of a time with this one.  Tried to call and place an order for delivery two times.  Both times the person on the phone acted or flat out just couldn't understand when I began to say the address of where I was.  Apparently 18th is hard to understand and when I even included that we were staying at the Hilton,which is literally a few blocks away, there was still confusion.  So, we get in our car and drive there.  We tell the person behind the counter about our 2 phone calls and he laughingly shows us his phone which has a damaged cord.  Pretty sure this guy was a manager of some sorts too.  We tried to ordered a couple sandwiches and of course, they had no bread.

We ordered a thin crust pizza and some sodas.  We got back to the hotel and opened the box only to find the greasiest pizza I have ever seen.  The thin crust pizza was as flimsy as a paper towel.  The grease basically covered the entirety of the bottom of the box.  It was disgusting.  Thin crust pizza should never be that greasy or flimsy.  This was just a horrible experience all around.

resp.text: Kurt, please give us a chance to make it right and fill out a feedback form at www.marcosguestfeedback.com. This way, we can have someone in your area reach out.

name: Ambria Rush
text: Best pizza I've tasted in all my 28 yrs on earth .. Enjoyed the grand opening specials ..Drivers very friendly .. Had no complaint against the company until today 08/16/16.. When we ordered a salad  from Marcos ...and the driver called back and claimed he was lost and he couldn't find our residence .. ( which they have delivered to us many times before) .. They gave the driver the correct address and he repeated it  and replied I can't deliver it AND HUNG UP !! .. So upon calling the store to complain about the "CUSTOMER SERVICE"..  I was informed that because I lived in a "urban " dwelling.. ( south town projects ) we wouldn't be able to receive delivery .. However we could walk and spend our money with them.. I will NEVER spend my HARD EARNED money with them again . they advertised their business in our neighborhood and the entire neighborhood showed up and spent money at the grand opening. Now all of a sudden you can't deliver here. There is a diverse group of nationalities here and believe it or not everyone here doesn't rob and steal. You really don't deserve any stars at all.  ONE STAR

name: John Stott
text:
Worst pizza place I have ever bought from and I travel 4 days a week
The pizza place has complete bozo receptionists that can’t write down an address ...and the driver gets lost when the HOTEL IS A FEW BLOCKS AWAY...the pizza shows up completely destroyed...well over an hour...never called me ...it was cold and they did not replace the pizza. NEVER AGAIN OMG THEY ARE HORRIBLE

name: Steven Newsome
text: I ordered a pizza with pepperoni and sausage and it was delivered without sausage. I called and talked to Marcus, who had good customer service. I told him, "it's not a big deal, just wanted to let you guys know". He insisted on getting the manager on the phone. Skylar, the manager, asked me to send a picture, which I immediately sent. After putting me on hold and observing the picture he told me "you're lying, I did that pizza and I don't make those mistake. You picked the sausage off the pizza." He completely caught me off guard and I had to ask him if he was being serious. I thanked him and hung the phone up. Skylar clearly isn't a business manager and I definitely won't be ordering from this location again.

resp.text: Hi Steven. We’re sorry to hear about this situation. If you'd like to provide additional details about your experience, please fill out this form www.tellmarcos.com. Thank you!

name: Ultreya Park
text: Well lit, new, large, clean; and friendly people who work there. Well taken care of and in great shape. Plenty of parking at store and plenty of pumps. Never had to wait. Can be bit tricky with 3 different kinds of traffic: 1)getting in/out of Chevron, 2)drive thru line for fast food place coming out that is housed in same building; and 3)the cars coming in to go to the car wash and the ones leaving bc in one continuous parking lot--all happening simultaneously. It works out, but care must be taken.

name: Melissa Holder
text: The kindest man ever works here. Mostly night shifts but occasionally I see him during the day. He is always smiling. Always friendly and helpful. Today I came into the store to witness him encouraging a crying woman who had just lost her mother. My heart goes out to her. We all need to lift one another up like this man did today. ❤️ I forgot his name but what an amazing person. He brightens my day to see his smile. Thank you!

text: The manager did nothing but walk around and dig in her eye while they were slammed. Her mask was in her bun rather than on her face. She did cut a pizza without washing her hands then left. Still busy and and I’ve been waiting 30 minutes for my refund or at least my food. Don’t do it

name: Antoinette Harmon
text: Quick pick up for Lunch

name: Mollie Newsome
text: It's assembly line pizza these days.....

name: Danny Wolfe
text: It never gets better.   I just got one of the awesome lunch combo pizzas...it had so much red sauce on it, it was literally dripping out from under the cheese.  I understand that true Italian pizza will emphasize the sauce frequently.  But this is Little Caesar's...this sauce is nothing to be proud of.  Not only that, I've used 10-15 napkins trying to drain the grease and it's still soaking wet and soggy.  Pizza dough should at least have a little crisp to it.  Most likely will not be back to this specific LC.

text: Delicious pizza, yummy wings, and the most amazing cheesy bread. My orders are always hot and fresh. There's so many toppings to chose from. I appreciate the quality of their business. Whether its lunch on the go. Or a night I can skip cooking dinner accompanied with a mountain of dishes. I'm most certainly there.

name: Sara Ferrera
text: Wow they changed management and staff! This location which is close to my home has done a complete 360 turn around, staff are not rude the food is fresh I went after 8pm and wasnt lied to about being out of wings I'm very shocked now! Extra most best pepperoni pizza was actually appealing to the eye and not sitting in a puddle of grease. Good job

text: The one by Howells ferry off of Moffett never has the pizza ready, people are rude and they always are out of certain specialty  pizzas. Especially deep dish. If you want a good little chasers go to the one by Walmart.  They are really good.

name: Loren Deagro
text: It took 15 minutes to get a "Hot n Ready" pizza at 4:30pm after being told 6 minutes. I could have been understanding of the time issue, but my pizza was extremely overcooked, the cheese was burnt and only covered 3/4 of the pizza.

name: Jayson Morgan
text: How does this place stay in business or maintain its franchise? They don't answer the phone and when they do they are rude and never have any toppings. When I went in to pick up the two people working the front both had their pants hanging down showing their butts and their underwear. Clearly their is no management overseeing the operation. It's sad that in this day and time this has become an acceptable business practices. With work ethic like this, why on earth should we raise minimum wage? To reward laziness and poor attitudes.

name: Jaylyn Hogan-Duncan

This store specifically is always late on orders. Today I ordered 4 pizzas 2 hours prior to pick up. The gentlemen on the phone seemed like he had no idea how to take an order. I placed pick up for 6 and showed up at 6. They just put the pizzas in at 6. No real concern for Customer service in this facility from any staff.
Management should be  more aware.

name: Esther Washington
text: This was one of the worst experience in fast food I have ever had. I went to visit Little Caesar pizza place. I ordered one pepperoni pizza and one cheese pizza. There were three females inside of Little Caesar two African American female and one Caucasian female. One of the African American females with a cashier then one day in the African American female in the back and a Caucasian female with making the pizzas. When I place my order Little Caesar around 8:51 p.m. which is the X stamped on my receipt. All of the workers in Little Caesars were on their cell phones or had the above's in the ear. I placed my order with the cashier, then I just watch to see what happened. I washed your Caucasian female put her phone down and take her ear plugs out, then she received it to wash your hands. Then I saw the African American female come from the back aisle set up phone down, but never saw her wash her hands. Then she proceeded to take down crust and lay them flat in trays and place butter on them along with the cheese. Not remember as I stated before, I never saw her wash your hands. Okay so I'll call the Caucasian female to the front and I said excuse me but she did not wash her hands referring to the African American female. Then the Caucasian female he's going to tell me that she washed her hands. The African American female and stated I don't know what you watching me for because I wash my hands. Then she proceeded to use negative language and added to that a very negative attitude. Simply because I requested that they follow safety procedures by washing their hands before touching food. Then the African American female continue to be negative and use and negative body language. I asked for the name of the manager and the district office number. I was told there was no district office for Little Caesar. I was told the manager on duty was the African American woman with the negative attitude and the one that use negative language. I asked who was the owner of this particular Little Caesar on Moffett Road in Mobile Alabama. I was told I think his name is Michael. So you telling me that you're working at a business and you don't even know who you're working for? I tried to reach someone in the office a little Caesar to put this situation. I will continue to reach out to Little Caesar until I get some type of reply. I'm just afraid that the person may not have enough self-control to walk away from someone else being ignorant. So my experience with this little Caesar on Moffett Road and Mobile Alabama was totally negative and I would advise anyone not to go. It's too many other places out there that would enjoy your money and how you spend it

text: I love Country Convenience, I love the country feel, and the wonderful people that you meet there. This place and the wonderful people that you will meet here and the wonderful Mrs Patty makes this one of the best and the most wonderful environments to be in. I miss working here for Mrs Patty and serving some of the most wonderful and amazing customers. When I worked here it was my home away from home and my coworkers were my family. I miss Mrs Patty, my home away from home and my family that I had while working here. This is a amazing place to go so everyone go and check it out and maybe meet the lovely and wonderful Mrs Patty it's worth it and you will fall inlove with the environment and wonderful people there too.

If you haven't tried this little country store your missing out. And the staff is courteous and pleasant. I will always patronize this local home owned business!

name: Jessica Heyer
text:
BEWARE!!  CARD SKIMMER ON CREDIT CARD MACHINE AT THE REGISTER INSIDE THE STORE.
When I used my debit card at this store on July 17, 2018, I was required to enter my pin # two times- once at the beginning of the transaction and again at the end of the transaction. I Asked the cashier why I was required to enter my pin twice and she quickly looked away nervously and didn't respond. I then turned the machine and looked closely at the side where cards are swiped. The machine appeared to have an overlay that had been mounted to the credit card machine. When I looked up, the cashier looked away quickly and would not make eye contact.

The following day, July 18, I began to see fraudulent charges posting to my bank account. I reported the charges to regions and was told by the bank manager that it appeared that someone had cloned my debit card. Regions is opening an investigation into the fraud.

TO THE OWNER OF THIS STORE-
YOUR EMPLOYEE (white female with brown hair, approx late 30s to 40s) that was working the register on July 17, 2018 around 1pm is a thief!!
If she stole from me, she'll steal from you and the rest of your customers!!

resp.text:
Thank you Erin for your review.  I am looking into this situation and please know that I take this issue  very serious.  I would love to speak to you to acquire more details . Country Convenience has never had this happen before.
Thank You   Patti Middleton  251-964-5674  or 251-747-7581

name: Jacob JingleHeimer Long
text: Fresh pizza made exactly how you choose. A plethora of menu pizzas or an extensive variety of toppings for your personal "create your own" pizza. Gluten free options as well as vegetarian. The average price of the menu pizzas range from $10 to $18 without modifications. The "create your own" pizzas can get pricey being that each topping cost roughly $1.25 ,but the portions are well worth the price. Always ask about the "specials" they're offering when ordering. Alot of times a large menu pizza can be had for under $10 and sometimes even come with a free side (cheese bread,cookie dough, etc.). All in all, Papa Murphy's offers gourmet "take and bake" pizza without that gourmet price.

name: Nikkinz
text: They have the best biscuits around the area. They do seem to run out of some foods (sometimes bacon but everyday eggs) and dont really prepare more even if I come in at 7 a.m for breakfast every single day. The girls have been very polite up until recently and not quite sure why that's changed but it's made me feel unwelcomed and I guess I'll have to start going back to Jack's. The older ladies are always nice and polite and though I could understand if it was sporadic visits during the week but it's literally everyday that I come for breakfast and lunch. They have great coffee the best I've found in Cullman. Again though the attitudes have made my visits undesirable and I'll be going there less now.  Another example has been when I get wings or chicken strips or even a hamburger they dont ask if I want condiments that generally go with the food but they will ask everyone around me if they want sauce or lettuce and tomato??? I am in Cullman for work purposes and when I found this place it was like a little hole from home and I fell in love but that has since deteriorated a bit and will be visiting less. :(

text: The biscuits are the best! However it seems they have a set amount they cook every morning and always run out early.My opinion is they should cook more as they already know they run out and have to turn away so many wanting breakfast. Also the lunch food items are cooked the fast way either in a microwave or a oven and would taste much better if ( for example) egg rolls , pizza sticks, tater wedges were deep fried not cooked in a microwave. Also maybe add more variety of lunch menu items. Just little things could use improvement but over all it  is a great store and the owner will order things to sell in the store if a customer ask and it is in his power to do so.I had ask for a certain kind of liquid creamer and it is now sold there.🎉

The stores shelves are always stocked and perfectly arranged and the entire store is always neat and clean no matter what time of day or night I stop in. Most of the cashiers are always friendly and courteous.

text: Shop here daily. Employees friendly. I get 1-2 cups of ice everyday because I absolutely am hooked on the crushed ice. My only complaint is the fluctuating price of ice. While I agree with charging for the cup used to hold the ice, I dont think charging for frozen water is  not really necessary, seriously. I and my family are there EVERY day and spend a lot of .money so I think ice would be a nice gesture especially when  I'm furnishing the cup. Mrs. Ann doesn't like my being in so often for ice apparently and charges me .more than any other cashier because "the price has gone up".....  For ice that  I put in my cup. The only assistance I received was the cashier taking my money. Of course all of this is petty and I don't mind paying for this service, because they have the ice I like and want so its warranted for me. Would just appreciate a little more courtesy and less fluctuating prices.

text: We have SNOW SLEADS come and get yours  before they’re gone. Limited quantities. Enjoy the snow.

name: Chris Kelso
text: The atm did not dispense my money due to being tied into phone line. So if you are getting money out to spend at that store..you will get screwed. I am a very loyal customer who will no longer go to this store. Clerk was very rude and acted like she could care less. Did not want to call the mananager. Acted like it was a big hassle to call him. I spend on average 180.00 a week on gas and about $50 a week on breakfast and drinks. I will let everyone know what a rip off this store is. I can see why you can't keep no help and it is a different person every two weeks.

name: Brandy Dingler
text: Love stopping threw on my way home or to work

name: Nick Nail
text: Has an Icee machine. 5 stars for that alone considering how hard they are to find.

name: cherokee price
text: Awesome crew, always polite and great friendly service. Love y'all

name: John Calloway
text: No Joey, Your Right!!! They Will Screw You Over Faster Than A Jack Rabbit On Speed!!!

resp.text: I dont know john or what problem he had , if i he had of contacted me it would have been made right.

name: Tracy Regelin
text: Well , the 3 star's are for the larger selection of food and snacks and household goods, it's similar to actual mini grocery store

name: Laura Bennett
text: Nice cashiers

name: Bruce
text: They have everything, friendly, clean, FREE WATER if you need it.

name: Matt Rasco
text: Great service

name: Jim Glimpse
text: Clean, bright, friendly & locally owned.

name: Joey Gill
text: I was traveling through.. my car was running hot needed​ water.. this place would not let me use the water hose.. so if you in a bind and need help like WATER look elsewhere.. not a friendly place..

name: Bruce Bentley
text: Thiis a response to the water hose response. I have never refused anyone water that needed it. I do keep the out side water locked because people were coming up here at night and stealing water from me. We have always helped anyone who ever needed help including water.

name: Julie Overton
text: I made a large order and expected better food. One pizza was so dry it tasted like stale crackers. Two of my pizzas barely had sauce on them, and one pizza had NONE! The garlic parmesan wings were fine as plain wings because sauce was just barely drizzled on them. When I tried to speak to the shift manager about the issue, she was rude and treated me as though I was making it all up to receive free food. I did not ask for a refund. I just asked that it be made right. I drove 20 miles to order and pick up food from this location and I will not be going back. This is the worst experience I've ever had with a Domino's.

name: Rebeckah Faye
text: So last night we ordered, and things got a little mixed up and our order was a late. They were super busy, it was a Friday night,  phone steady ringing. Well the manager on duty ((i didn't catch his name)) lovely gentleman, went above and beyond to fix the mistake that was made. I was so mad when I went in and bless his heart he caught an earful, but when I say he handled it with ease and grace. Baby he did WONDERFUL. Kudos to you sir. I know this store has much growing to do but they are lucky to have a boss man like you!!

name: Brad Seal
text: The food is awesome!  Pizza is good but the wings are great, even better!  They're a real life save because it's literally the only place in town that delivers and like many others I'm working from home and can't find time to get much shopping done.  Thanks to Dominoes for coming and saving our town :D

name: Alisa Gill
text: I would give them zero stars if possible. 1st I tried placing an order that should have been $18.99 + tax. It came to $24.50 + tax. Finally got that corrected and when it said my order was ready they told me 5 more mins. Then after that I was told a delivery driver took my pizza. After agreeing to make another one I get a phone call stating that I have to take the one that the driver took. Nope!!

name: Desirea Jenkins
text: Love this place!!! As a food industry worker myself, I commend these folks on doing such a great job. Theyve blessed us at huddle house with free food. Anyone who does that is a winner in my eyes 😍

name: Big Country
text: This is the second time I've ordered delivery from here and my wife agrees that the service was excellent, the pizzas were exactly what we order and cooked perfectly, delivery drive was quick and followed the contact less delivery instructions to the tee. So keep up the good work guys, and don't let these other reviews get to you.

name: Luke Hostwaters
text: I was placing my order over the phone, as the girl goes to repeat my order back to me and tells me my total, she giggled. I got very frustrated because of the situation. I asked was something wrong and she said no im trying to find you a coupon so you don’t have to pay 50 dollars. This made me laugh after my long day of work, the little things people do or say make a difference, and most workers do not realize that. thanks kyla. i did not really catch the name so i tried my best. amazing food, my lava cakes were the best. i definitely plan on being back!

name: Courtney Brown
text: Easy ordering online and carside drop off makes it simple and easy.

name: Jason Evans
text: Would give 0 stars if I could. My order was wrong on this visit and the one before.  They did offer to fix it but driving 30 mins back to the store wasn't worth it.  Little Ceasar's is better never had an issue with them. Won't be back to Hamilton Alabama Dominos.

name: Benji Rider
text: Dude... Asked for the buffalo chicken bites and they sent plain chicken w a cup of buffalo sauce. They even called to confirm my order and was still incorrect. Then tried to charge me a second delivery charge to fix it, and told me to tip the driver again. When I got the correct chicken there was about a drop of buffalo sauce on each. Worst Dominos ever.

name: Lisa Walker
text: Well if I could have went lower i would have. It would have been nice to get a warm pizza, that wasn't hard a a brick

name: andrea loden
text: Seriously disappointed, myself the pizza is subpar to say the least and what they call csr Incompetent. Who does not understand what “ my order is wrong “ , means.? And then, their representative starts giggling while on the phone with you saying but I don’t understand “ what do mean it wasn’t right ? Please for the Love of god don’t release them if they’re not trained.... in phone etiquette and basic communication skills. It’s frustrating for people who are trusting you with their food.

name: Amber Luker
text: The food is great but the delivery person  was very rude

name: Donna Harris
text:
My 2 pizzas were overcooked and had hardly any cheese
I will think twice before ordering sgain

name: Ophie May
text: Dominos in Hamilton is a joke. I've been on the phone for half an hour just trying to get my pasta fixed, but ya know.. they don't answer.. I ordered a chicken alfredo and recieved this very dry pasta, the alfredo sauce is nonexistent.

name: Sabrina Brents
text: My order was 45 minutes late. I went thru the drive-thru and was told to make another lap since my pizza was in the oven.  I said how about I just pull over and park and someone brings it out.  The man at the window said ok. Keep in mind the car that was in front of us in the drive thru sat at the window for 15 minutes before we pulled up and we were told to make another lap. I waited another 20 minutes and finally just went in and got it. Also the car that was behind us was still at the window when i went in to get the pizza.. The food was ice cold.

name: Joe Shmitty

text: My husband and I have ordered from here via the app at least 3 times over the past year. The employees have always been nice and the store has been clean. We have always gotten exactly what we ordered and it was always warm. Using the app allows us to avoid any wait time as well, so I would recommend using it if you are not willing to wait.

name: Susan Sanford

I don't mind a small crust but that was ridiculous. I will go back but hopefully this will not happen again

Park go inside waited 10 min said I had to pick up from kiosk. Ok I never got a code sent to me. The lady was rude and hateful because I didnt have this code. I just wanted a quick meal to feed my family. After much debate she finally found a code. I got my horribly cold pizza and no sauce that i ordered. So. I will from now on drive on into Camera. Will not ever go back to this location. The red head lady working needs customer service skills and retraining.

name: jason hunt
text: This place is so slow, it took 10 mins of waiting for them to take my order and i was the only one in line.. then another 10 for my pizza! Crazy for a place like this. Staff was not rude but wasn't very polite either. (I ordered the deep deep dish pizza btw).

name: Denese Luck
text: Although everyone was extremely nice and the food is delicious I need napkins when I eat. Can never get any from Domino's. Paper napkins is the same as a paper box when it comes to germs(covid). Ridiculous!

name: Mellissa Harris
text: The system was down online so I had to call the store. No one answered and I called four times. When I arrived at the store their were at least 6 employees there.  I informed thetge worker and she didn't seem to care. This dominos location on gateway has really gone down and the only reason I went was for my uncle. Service is poor and they usually get my order wrong that's why I've stopped eating at this location. They really need a better manager. And an employee also drop a customers sauces while delivering curbside and didn't pick them up. Just very unprofessional location and very lazy.

name: Michael Rizzuto
text: Got a phone call minutes after placing my order to inform me that their hours had changed and they no longer delivered to the address for the hotel I was staying at. They need to updated their website to reflect this. I understand they are low staffed but she said until the end of summer the hours had changed. Need to fix that so other travelers aren’t wasting their time.

name: Drew Hill
text: Overall good. I would suggest sticking with the hand tossed pizzas. Tried the pan and got the extravaganza, basically the supreme with everything and it turned out really doughy like it needed a few more minutes in the oven. This is typical when there's that many toppings, but was still a bit disappointed. Ended up finishing it myself in the oven at home.

name: cowanization
text: Quick, hot, and fresh!! Thank you for delivering to a trucker 😎🚛

name: Brandon Holt
text: The pizza is good but it's a little pricey when you can go get it somewhere else cheaper but a if you want better Pizza you pay the money

name: GERALD PLOTT
text: Phone rang for over 10 minutes, got there and they said they dont answer the phone. Papa Johns's had no problem taking my order. They should just close it down.

name: Chris Ferguson
text: Placed order and they took my money. Then tell me we can’t put in ur order and it’ll be 3 to 5 days before u get ur money back.  Bs I bet I want use them again!!!

name: Triniti Evans
text: I did not get garlic butter on my bread knots!

name: Jessica Driggers
text:
First off, the female who answered the phone hung up on me when i asked her to hold on.  I understand not being able to hold,  but all she had to do was say that and not hang up on me.....because when i called back she then had me hold.

Then when i got to the store they couldn't break a $100 bill...when my bill was $40, so they claimed they didn't have $60 worth if change in the drawer..... frightfully inconvenient....and the female at the counter told me to 'just go to the gas station and get change'.....so much for customer service....

We WILL NOT be going back to this location.... there are much nicer, friendlier, more customer-centric locations with the same area.

AND, don't order cheese bread and expect any sauce, THE MANAGER said that 'every franchise does it differently'....I guess I misunderstood the concept of a franchise.

name: Johnathan Wealth
text: Ordered at 8:30pm still haven’t gotten my order and it’s 10:27pm now called 5 times no answer

name: Ellie Miller
text: the last four times i’ve called i was on hold for ever and when they finally picked up the phone they hung up on me immediately.

name: Kimberly Patrick
text: Order online. Order was cancelled because no driver and they said they called 3x but I only go 1 call...and couldn’t confirm refund...bad service

name: Judy King
text: I asked what they had for special i was told larg specialty for 14.99 told the guy that i wanted that then said i wanted a med pepperoni. When it was delivered i got hust the med pepperoni. When i called back the guy who i placed my order with when i told him that i was to have 2 pizzas one was a larg specialty an med pepperoni he said i didnt specify what specialty i wanted i thought a specialty was with everthing one it futher more he didnt even bother to even ask me what specialty i wanted. I guess nectime inorder i guess ill go to all the way to auburn to pizza hut cause when you ask for specialty they give you all the way on it unless younask for meat lovers or a supreme pizza. I guess thats what i get for not realy asking down to the details what their specialty means. Your people who answers phone needs to learn how to place an ask your guest what they want on pizzas cause they just cost you money. Cause i dont like to go all the way to auburn to get pizza when i can have it delivered but not any more for a person who dont like the auburn trafic guess i will have to fight it next time for a pizza. Thank you for your hospitality an for not trying to make things right with you customer.

text: Please an order before closing my order was canceled because they didn’t feel like fixing/delivering the order called next day manager was very rude stated he wasn’t there add they had there reasons I thought that was so unprofessional

name: elizabeth konegan
text: I have had them deliver to my house for the last 9 years and all of a sudden they don't deliver out here . You will not get any of my business anymore .
