text: My daughter came and picked up a pepperoni pizza and cinnionmon twist.. I am very displeased with both.. They were burnt and very tough to eat.. I don't think I will be coming back...

name: Jessie Hodges
text: My daughter came and picked up a pepperoni pizza and cinnionmon twist.. I am very displeased with both.. They were burnt and very tough to eat.. I don't think I will be coming back...

name: Kristina Wilkes
text: If I could give zero stars I would. This place is run poorly. They are always understaffed. I placed an order for delivery and they called me 15 minutes later (when the delivery quote was 22 minutes) to inform me that they could not deliver my pizza but I could come pick it up for the SAME PRICE even though the delivery fee is 3.99 and I tipped the driver 20%. The manager was useless. I don’t even blame the staff there, seems like it stems from corporate. Absolutely awful.

name: Staci Cannon
text: My pizza was burnt and it was a hot mess. I wont never spend a dime with them

name: Muffinman Wolfe
text: Dude, this dominos was operating with one manager and one delivery guy on a Thursday night! Constant phone calls, rushing back and forth, the delivery guy helping make pizzas and taking four to five deliveries out while we were there, I mean these two guy were killing it! Absolute badasses and deserve some praise!

name: Tammy Stafford-Bellflower
text: Ordered, through the app, a large Brooklyn MeatZZa pizza a few minutes past 5: pm, and the alert came up a few minutes later saying it was ready. I live 40 minutes away, and I get home, open up the box, and no meat; just plain cheese pizza. I called and was told they would do another one...and plus one, for free, and that it would be ready by the time I arrive. I go in to pick up and both orders are wrong, again. I had to wait 15 minutes for them to redo the orders. It ended up being 2 1/2 hours before me and my family finally got to eat.

name: Kesia Drake
text: Been on hold for a hour every time I call😡😡😡

name: Shelia Hoyett
text: I ordered my items online... I did not get them until way too late..it was not hot. They knew the service was terrible because they immediately gave me a 20% coupon off of my next order.( I didn’t even speak to anyone about my order nor did I leave a review).. so they knew it was terrible service...so fast forward to today I ordered my items online and when I got them they were not hot... I was trying to track my order.. and couldn’t so I called the store and was told the GPS system was down. I don’t know what is going on but being that I live only 2 minutes away I would think my food would be much better than I have been getting considering I include a “suggested”  tip every time .. my first order was under $20 but the next day my order was over $50 and it still was the same thing... Luke warm pizza and desserts!!!!! Very disappointed!!!!

name: Kristine Rogers
text: They made our pizzas exactly the way we asked them to.

name: duke likins
text: employees are awesome

name: Savannah Ellsworth
text:
UPDATE: I changed my review because after getting in touch with HQ the manager called to formally apologize and take care of it, which I really appreciated. Hoping for better experiences from here on.
I never order from Domino's and always get papa johns. I decided I wanted a drink and they have sprite so I ordered from there today. The driver brought the wrong drink and was gone before I notice so I called the store. Whoever answered the phone said do you want us to have the driver bring you another one. I said yes because that's what I ordered and she said I don't even know how long it'll be and then hung up without even asking where I live or anything. Took a chance and will not be ordering here again. Talk to the staff about some manners. I work in the food service too. (Still waiting on soda to be here. Who know if it'll come)

text: So why don't you deliver to the Golden Cherry hotel? They waited till after my pizza out of oven before calling me. I don't have a car so I can't pick it up. Seriously?!

name: zjp1995
text: I normally never have issues with this particular location but I placed an order online. I got to the place checked my pizza out and it was burnt around the crust and it also had very little cheese on it with bubbles. I asked the young lady that rung me up to remake the pizza and she was very nice about it and was about to remake the pizza with no problem! Although then the manager came around the corner and was making smart remarks. He said and I quote "order your pizza right the first time online". Now mind you I ordered the pizza correctly it was made poorly. He was very unprofessional and rude. Kuddos to the young lady though, she should take his position because he clearly doesn't know customer service. 3 stars  because management needs work.

name: Jennifer Clark
text:
The pizza was hot and ready when I arrived. However, it wasn't up to the quality I have come to expect from Domino's. The toppings became sparse before ending at the signature garlic crust edge. Our pizza was full of bubbles and actually had burnt portions. Our cutter may have been new because it was highly inconsistent. We had slices equal to 1 1/2-2 slices then baby slivers.

I was just passing through so I can't speak on if this was the typical quality or if we caught them on a bad night. My typical experience at other locations 500 miles from here are much better so hopefully this location was just training a newbie.

name: Justin Edwards
text: They never have enough drivers the food is always cold I wouldn’t recommend anybody to them 5 thumbs down

name: D Brown
text: I don't like to do negative reviews, but 2.00 frozen pizzas would have been better than what we paid over 30.00 for tonight!  it took an hour just to get the food out the door!!!  Apparently this store is poorly managed.  Worst pizzas I've ever had... one pizza had burnt bacon, very thin crust, overcooked, stale, and was very drrrrryyyy.  The other one was very dry, stale tasting, and the inside of the pizza was undercooked.  We ended up giving nearly all of it to the dog but she didnt even eat much of it, and she usually eats anything until she over stuffs herself and throws up and eats that too. She also enjoys trashcan food and cat poo.  She walked away from the pizza.  Only 8 minutes away, and it took almost an hour and a half to get 2 pizzas and 1 cheese bread.  And as if this wasn't  enough, we ordered marinara sauce, which was non existent with our meal.  The delivery person was very professional, kind, and punctual with the order.

name: Jennifer Washington
text: Pizza was great.

name: Mon Petit Chou
text: We had been very happy with their product for the most part. However, between our last pizza being burnt black and just receiving a phone call to inform us that our order would not be delivered for 2.5-3 hours(!), they have lost customers. We are not happy.

name: DJBreeze652
text: waited 2 hours for food to be delivered. their tracker definitely is broken online.

text: The service is beyond pathetic!  Run from this place!!!!!!! Completely horrible service!!!!

name: Brad Harwell
text: The service is beyond pathetic!  Run from this place!!!!!!! Completely horrible service!!!!

name: Anthony Chambers
text: The driver was on time. Very nice. And constantly kept a smile on her face. And very respectful. And the food is very good. My first time eating from this dominos pizza since I moved here and I'm very impressed. Thank you. You have my business.

text: Called for delivery on a Tuesday at 6 PM. Was told it would take an hour and 45 minutes. Decided to pick up. 2 people working with a delivery car in front and no customers inside. My order with one other was all that was in process. Had to use debit card because they did not have $22 for change. Good pizza awful service.

text: I ordered the day before and called in the morning to make sure they will have it ready on time.. sure enough I had to wait 20 min to get my order.....no apologies nothing

(Supposed to be hand tossed)  and mass majority of the pizzas were black on the bottom.  Typically pizza is GREAT.. it's been a bit but Domino's fell short last night.  Cinnamon twist and customer service was just fine.  Was in and out no wait.

name: Tanya Singh
text:
I know it's not that to give it just two stars since for the kind of quality food that they  provide and of course who doesn't love their pizzas. But one of my very first delivery experiences that I just had today.
It's not about the 50 cents or so that I paid for that Marinara Sauce but all that matters a lot is when you have it on waiting and no wonder they forget it. If I forgot to ask for it when getting my breadsticks and the pizza delivered, I think it's still majorly on their part wrong for not to provide it.
Sometimes even the slightest of the wrongs piss a lot. I tried to call them right back immediately and was told that they going up sending it right back but none showed up.
Must be wondering who comes back for just this much, right? I knew it too somewhere in my mind but didn't really know that they be lacking behind this low on customer satisfaction. I, myself deliver stuff at my other side job to my  Customers and I make sure everything is so pitch-perfect knowing that eeling of the customer excitedly waiting and having all their eyes on the person delivering it, because, "FOOD is love, FOOD is Happiness".

text: We order frequently from this store and so much so that we have earned a free pizza.  However, the pizza we got this evening was.  It was cold, and half of the crust was burned so that we couldn't eat it, and the other half was almost burned.  What a huge disappointment for $24.00!  We switched from Papa John's to Domino's months ago, but we never experienced this disaster!

name: Abigail Rose
text: After waiting an hour and a half for my pizza to be delivered I decided to call the store just to make sure the order actually got placed. The manager told me they only had one driver on that i would get mine soon (I got it about 30 minutes after this call). I understand the lack of staff BUT CALL ME AND LET ME KNOW WHATS GONIG ON. Also DON'T DELIVER MY PIZZA LUKE WARM AND DRIED UP FROM WAITING TO BE DELIVERED!!! Honestly even a apology from the manager or driver would have been nice.

text: Very bad management.  I ordered a carryout special online, only to find out it wasn't ready when I got there after plenty of time.  Also, once it was ready I was informed there was a softball size hole in the middle and they would have to remake it.  Waited another 20 minutes on the re-bake only to be given the bread twist that were cold after sitting for 25 minutes.  I asked them why they didn't re-bake the twist as well only to receive bad attitude from the manager.  I will not order again from this store.

Out of all the chain pizza places in the area, this Dominos is easily the best and most consistent.

name: CHRIS Teague
text: Hands down the best Dominos in the world and I have used a lot of Dominos locations all across the map. Service is outstanding, never have had my order made incorrectly or lost or whatever. Most of the people that work there know my name, say most because this is a college town so there's always new faces when I go there. Order is almost always ready when I get there or just coming out of the oven, almost never have to wait around long which makes it super convent. Food is always hot when I pick up my order, unless I am late so can't fault them for that lol. If your going to get Dominos in Auburn/Opelika go to this store you won't be sorry even if your south or west of campus the extra drive is worth it. Also if you use a smartphone use there app or go online makes ordering a breeze but you can call in too they handle that easily as well (just try to know what you want, they will thank you for that and people in the store will thank you for that. Having to recite the entire menu isn't fun when you can get the info online). Hats off to my favorite Dominos crew, thank you for the great food and great service!

text: The community is lucky to have such a friendly, affordable place to get quality pizza and desserts.  Sign in online to order and start receiving points toward earning free food!  A couple weeks ago, I picked up a pizza and cinnamon knots and they forgot to give me the glaze.  I spoke to Patricia the manager and she treated me so kindly!  Came back the following week and she had made a comment on my account to provide me a replacement dessert for the missing glaze. Devan added an extra glaze which I put in the fridge as a back up!  Excellent staff that always provide a smile!  Dominos purchased the old Burger King and remodeled it.  They have a indoor seating area, which I hope will be open for guests to eat inside someday.  I could see many wonderful birthday parties and celebrations there!

name: Eric Hill
text: Excellent service and quality pizza is hard to find at chains, sometimes, but this store has both. This local Domino's is new and delivering pizza quickly is what they do. Great carryout service as well, a large dine-in area and a free-to-use (by reservation) Community Room makes this a great spot for groups as well as celebrations. The drive thru pickup window is just a bonus, especially if you're in need of pizza and cheesy bread and the lobby is closed. Definitely worth trying.

text: Called and put on hold for 25 minutes no help.

name: Elisha Hardy
text: The pizza to small

name: Megan Mertz
text: Y'all seriously need to get down to Papa Murphy's because they have got some excellent service some excellent customer services and appreciation benefits happening down there! Thanks guys this pizza is about to rock!

name: Derrick Crigger
text: Always great food when we go there. The place is clean and they are great deals on Tuesday and Friday... Tuesday is large any type of pizza for $10 and firday is large thin crust one topping for $5.

name: Squeezed_ Charmaine
text: Convenient

name: Emily Mayes
text: Papa Murphy's not only has the best pizza and freshest ingredients in town, it is also an amazing place to work. The management is great and everyone gets along as a team. I'm proud to be part of the Papa Murphy's team!

name: Gretchen Wyland
text: Been more consistent lately. Good price, definitely worth it (especially on Tuesdays).

name: Joey
text: Decent pie if you want to cook it in a home oven

name: Frances Melicks
text: Great food and even better service!! Thanks guys !

name: Mel Pedersen
text: Quick....good and cheap

name: Gigi Ton
text: I like this place, mainly, cause you see what's going on with your food..and they always, always wear gloves, no question about it. Friendly staff..

name: Megan DeAngelis
text: Decent pizza.

name: Geof Currie
text: It's good, it is but its best fresh out the oven!

name: Amie Hamilton
text: Decent pizza

name: D LAMBERT
text: Pizza is great.

name: kim rosario
text: great pizza

name: Queen Isaac
text: STAFF NEEDS TRAINING; PLEASE BRING BACK THE OLD EMPLOYEES.

name: Kecia Ross
text: Pizza is good.

name: Felicia Sardin
text: A 🍕 you pick up, to bake at home.

name: Amber Marshall
text: $5 Fridays

name: Charlene Dean
text: Great pizza

name: Jeremy Dossett
text: Quick,  tasty.

name: Loretta Brazelton
text: Nice place to go.

name: Holly Lapointe Jordan
text: Super good food.  Had to wait for service!!

name: Ke Ke
text: $5 pizza.. 😍

name: Freda Williams
text: My favorite pizza...Fresh toppings

name: Sarah Venable
text: I stay right by Sunny and Sandy's store, they are wonderful people and they care about their customers. If they don't have something I need they make sure to have it the next time I go in there.

name: Sharon Collins
text: Convienant to shop

name: Jaquanna Young
text: Had a deli in there

name: S G
text:
Waited an hour and a half when promised an hour. Pizza was made correctly but was cold. Called to check on status; while on hold, the pizza arrived, and I put it in the oven to heat and stayed on the phone to complain that it was late and cold. After 15 minutes on hold, I hung up.
We hadn’t ordered from Domino’s for a couple of years or more due to multiple problems with late, cold, incorrect orders. We preferred to order from Papa Murphy’s, but found out today that they closed. What a sad day for Leeds! Not only was the pizza far superior, but it was much less expensive. From now on, I’ll make my own pizza. There are no good options for pizza in Leeds. That is pitiful.

name: Wolf J. Flywheel
text: I order from here like 3 to 5 times a week. I've even placed 2 orders in the same day. This Domino's is solid. 5 out of 5 stars, because 6 out of 5 isn't possible. 👌💪🤘🍕🍗 🥦🔥☁😑

name: Lynn Cleghorn
text: If I could give a negative star I would. These are the absolute rudest people with the social skills of a snake. I ordered online contact less curbside pick up at 6 pm. The tracker said it would be done between 621 and 631. At 640 they still hadn't brought it out.  I went in. They hadn't even started it. I asked for a refund, especially after I looked over at a pizza a lady was returning that was burnt to a crisp. They said 3 to 5 days for the refund. And were rude about it. They could care less of they lose business.  But let me tell you I have a big mouth and will make  sure that I tell everyone I know to go elsewhere.  I've never hoped a business would go under. Buy this place would be better served to clean house and start over from scratch with people who want to work.

name: Nia Green
text: This place is literally horrible. I’ve been waiting for my food patiently for 2 hours. This isn’t the first time i got food from here, & I don’t know why i decided to even give them another chance. The customer service is horrible, they all have attitudes, especially the driver. Like how are y’all going to all have attitudes? No one told them to get this job. No one forced them to work.  i’m honestly so upset but i don’t want my ghetto side to come out. So, anyway.... if you thinking about ordering here, DON’T.

name: adam ledbetter
text: Was on hold for over 30 minutes before I gave up.

name: Ky Jones
text: Food was perfect! Would have given 5 stars if the people working there weren’t in a competition at being the rudest person on the planet... Weird.

name: Heather Conn
text: It seems there is always some problem. Couple of weeks ago I waited on my deliver for 3 1/2 hours. Finally I went up to the store, door locked. I asked guy that works the add he was taken trash out. About my order. He said all orders were cancelled and refunded. Mind you its now 12@ night. I was not notified, he answered  he didn't send any info on it bout it. So many people were lined up around whatabuger BC of this. Someone needs to get help in there or clean house fresh employees to do the job. Have lived here for 1yr and I still havent had a good experience. Always a problem ..never solving issue

name: Stephanie McElmurray
text: As much money as we spend with this Dominos, and we call to complain about there not being the extra cheese we ordered, the guy on Friday May 21st at 8:22pm put me on hold for a long time only to come back to say he'd be glad to retake my order for me to pay for. Really? I told him I'd bring the pizza back, to which he just sat there. You have lost a valuable customer Sir, and I'll make sure to call the owners at how rude you were. What ever happened to customer service?

name: Savannah Stamps
text: We placed an order for delivery at 7:57 and checked the status of our order at 9:00 pm. It said our order was being prepped, so I called the store, waited on hold for 10 minutes and when the lady picked up, I asked about our order. She immediately said, “we just don’t have the staff to do all these orders so I’ll cancel it.” I told her we would still like to order and she said “well we haven’t started making it yet.” I expressed my frustration and asked her how we would’ve been notified if we didn’t call and she said that she’s already gave us a refund. When I asked how we would get our rewards back that we redeemed on our order she hung up. So I called back, placed on hold for 4 minutes this time and asked her how we would get our rewards back and she said “I dont know how you would do that, I dont know how to work the website.” We’ve always chosen dominoes over any other chain pizza but I think we will head on over to Papa John’s next time and see if they are competent enough to make a pizza and have it delivered in under an hour, or at least communicate properly.

name: Michael Donnelly
text: Always on time. Never had any problems.

name: Terry Brown
text: Dominoes was good but they did burn my first pizza and tried to serve it to me. Luckily I checked before getting too far away. But they replaced it for me and fixed the issue. The food was tasty .

name: Freebie Babe
text:
Wow. I ordered my food at 9 pm on 4/24. It is now 12:35am the next day and I never received my food. Their phone lines are busy and the tracking is no longer available. Never again will I order from them.

Update: I called the next day and asked to speak to the Manager. The Manager says to me, "Yeah what's up? I mean my bad.How can I help help?"

What kind of ghetto establishment is this? I consistantly ordered from there and always tipped. They lost a valued customer. No apology was given and no incentitive. Not to mention an employee in the background was getting smart with the Manager because I asked for a confirmation on my refund. Wow.

name: Daniel Davis
text: The worst experience I’ve even had with any food place! I don’t even Write reviews but this was so awful, food was cold, wrong, and over 2 hours late!

name: Forbidden Goddess
text: Very very slow and always cold pizzas. Need to do better

name: Fred Westrom
text:
The food is always good enough, but the delivery service is extremely inconsistent.
I have frequently waited 2 or more hours for deliveries from the Leeds dominos when the website predicts 25-45 minutes.
Consider calling the manager in person to place your order and ask if they can deliver in reasonable time because sometimes they just don't or can't.
Frequently when they are busy they don't even answer the phone so you can't even check on your order.

I restate though that the food is usually what you expect.
It could just take a long time to get your order.

I do still order from them.  I just have very low expectations when I do.

name: Loren Henderson
text: Terrible customer service. Employees clearly do not care and management does not hold them accountable whatsoever. I will go out of my way to pick up rather than use this location. 0/10 do not recommend.

name: Beckii Perea
text: Extremely laid back atosophere.  They were helpful with local deal's.

name: Elizabeth Bendall
text: WORST PLACE EVER!! Was promised 15 minutes and ordered at 7:10 and was ready at 8:20. Late to our movie and the place was disgusting.

name: Geoffrey Allen
text: I was pretty mad that every other Pizza place in the area was closed by 9pm. We chose to go to dominoes as a last resort and boy that was a mistake. Our experience with Noah was hands down the best customer service experience that we have had in a long time. He provided us with menu choices as we had no idea what we wanted. He even knew the exact cost of menu items after tax. Excellent customer service we will definitely be back.

name: JACOB FREEZE
text: This is the worst food service establishment in history. I should have learned after the experience that took us 3 hours to finally cancel a pizza that never came. I ordered a pizza and chicken around 10:15 on a Monday. An hour later the order is still in prep. I called the store to be put on hold for 20 minutes. I drive to the location and when i show up the phone is ringing and the manager just walks lazily out of the back. He hasn’t made the food, he isn’t doing anything. He says he has one driver that is about to quit. He asks if he can give me something for free. I said my food. He says he’d have to make it. This place would be better off as a parking lot. Add to that Domino’s has no real corporate support for these situations and you’re in for an evening of pulling your hair out.

name: rick baker
text:
The pizza arrived on time but it was Cold no cheese barely any toppings
Just a bad pizza

name: Josh Locklear
text: Absolutely horrible service. Called to check on my order, keep in mind I live less than 2 minutes away, and was told it would be right to me. An hour later, still no food.

name: Bradley Soto
text: Pizza was burnt and not even cut. Not even cut!!! Both of them!

name: N C
text: They will cancel your order after making you wait over an hour, not contact you to tell you if anything is wrong, and have an angry response for you when they finally answer after making you hold for 15 minutes on the phone. Save your money and just order from carpenetti's.

name: Caleb Smith
text: I understand being understaffed, but I waited for my food for hours with no call and the store wouldn’t answer the phone either. Never received my pizza and still am waiting for a refund.

name: Miguel Gabriel
text: Too expensive   small pizza $15  ridiculous  had about six pieces of sausage  a couple of pepperoni  never again

name: Nicholas Toth
text: Very nice people and good food.

name: slydawg97
text: Placed an order that was "being prepared " for 1.5 hours, called and sat on hold for 10 minutes only for someone to pick up the phone and hang it back up. Went to the store that was for once not understaffed and not busy, the cashier said she'd check the status of it but who the hell wants the food that long after ordering, they didn't even give me a refund, just a store credit for next time as if there's ever gonna be one

name: Austin Park
text: Got lunch from here for carryout and it was ready   in about 10min and tasted great!

name: Ethan Keating
text: Me and eboi just had the best pan pizza we ever done ate. Man that was good. Hold that crown, kings

name: Nicholas Toth
text: Great people and good food.

name: Oshun El
text: Food made wrong i waited an hour on a 45min wait time. Dont order from here it took 3people to get on the phone to do a refund

name: ashley decker
text: I don’t normally do reviews but let me start off with the lady on the phone was great. She was trying to help me. Now I ordered the $19 mean deal 2 pizzas parmesan bites and a 2 L and cinnamon twist. I got everything came inside got everything out and the Parmesan bites had nothing on them no butter no cheese so I live 3 mins from there. I called them asked if they can just send me some more.... she said yes but you’ll have to pay the delivery charge... uh no I already paid it once for the order to be right but it wasn’t she said ma’am I can give you a credit I said okay I’m thinking she just going to refund me the amount that it was for just them. No she said it’s a credit for when I want to order again I can call them. She said they are under new management and couldn’t do anything but what she has already tried to do... I was done fighting I just said okay thanks and hung up. I’m tired of this dominos not the first time something like this happened at this one.

name: Sareena Bagley
text: I wouldn't even give one star. Placed order at 7pm and it said Dustin was preparing.  Went to the store because nobody would answer the phone and they said they had not even started preparing yet, 8:57pm... plus, they acted like they could care less. So, I canceled my order and its a Sunday where everything closes at 9pm. Dominos, you SUCK....

name: Christopher Nix
text: Placed an order online a whole hour before they closed and they rejected my order. Negative five stars. Horrible service

name: Hannah Abrams
text: Well after my order took longer than it should, my drink was not included. So the guy ran to the store and then when I opened my box of pizza I didn’t receive any of the sauces I PAID for. Is didn’t even come with the regular garlic sauce. So I have been on the phone waiting for someone to answer for 10 minutes trying to let them know to bring the sauces with the drink. But of course, no one is answering. I’ll just start going back to Papa Johns.

name: JT Kendrick
text: Order took over an hour on more then one occasion, didn’t answer any phone calls.

name: TJ Piazza
text: Ordered a pizza at 845PM for delivery. Called the store at 10:30pm requesting an update and was left on hold for 15 minutes while some one went to “check” called back at 11PM and was told they’re short staffed and had to cancel my order. It took them 2 hours to tell me that. Ridiculous

name: manuel delgado
text: Very bad, I waited 1:30 and I saw a lot of people making complaints

name: Jeff Viehland
text: Don't expect curbside delivery, when there so busy. corporate should resend the ad. If they only had a clue.

name: Carl Benefield
text: Twice now it has taken over two hoirs to receive our pizza. I habe called multuple times and have never been able to speak with anyone.

name: heather kelly
text: Ordered boneless chicken tonight 2 buffalo and one plain from the Leeds, AL store. Got home I had 3 buffalo and one order was nothing but the crumbs cooked. Had to go back to the store, and when I got there a young gentleman asked what was the problem I asked for a manager another young gentleman said Im the manger. I opened the box and "YES" I tossed the open box on the counter and ask is this what you have people pay $8 for (trash) crumbs. The young kid said I can give you a free order NO its called replacement. Was waiting in truck when one of the employees came out and tossed the box of chicken on top of my hood and walked away. Then to top it off NOT one of the employees had on a mask.

name: Artie McIntyre
text: Very efficient and easy to use.

name: Debbie Alexander
text: Ordered pizza & it was burned & the garli c parmesan wings are just plain wings with what looks like dressing on them !! Won't order again

name: Jennifer Netherland
text: If I could give them zero I would ordered my pizza at 10:30, being the patient person I am I calmly wait at 11:57 it stated my driver left. Never showed up, and I called the store for an hour and no one answered. I am livid , and will never go to dominos again. I tipped 25% and can't even get my money back for pizza I never received.

name: Cherryl Streeter
text: The pizza was horrible.  The customer Service was excellent.

name: Jon Bryant
text: Average pizza and average customer service

name: YoungSandwich
text: its service is slow and its attention to detail is lacking such as if you dont want a certain thing such as onions on your food it will be ignored so i wouldn't even bother with requesting it to be taken off but outside of that and its extremely long time before you receive your order its ok i suppose as long as you are willing to wait 2 hours maybe more before getting it

name: Andy Hawkins
text: No one answers phone after recording. On hold for 15 minutes or more.

name: Bobbie Jean
text: Was doing an online order. But couldn't because I had to pay with card and only have Cash

name: Robin Ransom
text: If I could I would give this place a ZERO! I have tired to give them the benefit of the doubt, however that third times a charm! First time delivered burnt pizza and yet still was delivered when it was “checked”, 2nd time they only had ONE driver and ONE cook with the driver having to deliver to 5 different homes once again why was delivery an option? 3rd time I wanted to see if they had anymore drivers to help with delivery since well today is Friday and should be a busy day and their should be more drivers to help speed things up plus my children wanted pizza, however it was taking up to 45 minutes  to an hour to deliver if I would have known that before selecting delivery things would have been different. Preparing and keeping quality should be number one! Delivery  should be the new norm and prepping should be done quickly as possible as well as workers being prompt to show that Dominos values and respects the rule of less contact is best and  social distancing is being taken seriously. Leeds,AL location lacks this lesson.I use to live in Hoover, AL  and would  order from the Vestavia Hills dominos and my order was done all within good timing and even on a FRIDAY at that! So for the manager to give such a poor excuse as to why they are not meeting the same expectation as a more populated area like Vestavia, AL  is just plan sad. Leeds location should not have ANY reason for such a long wait.For a small community you would think the turn around time would be within reasonable time frames. Plus per the manager they have SEVERAL drivers! So trust me save your money invest in Papa Johns!!

name: CHRISTOPHER TAYLOR
text: Drivers will get lost and blame me because they can't find my house. I haven't changed my address and have no control over their navigation.

name: Austin Park
text: Food is delicious. They get a little behind sometimes but you just gotta make sure to order ahead of time if you wanna order on the weekend

name: Bare Grilles
text: If bipolar disorder was a restuarant this Dominos would be it.

name: Collin Snider
text:
Ordered a pizza on the online app and waited 3 hours and called a couple of times before I finally went to the dominos myself. This was the day COVID-19 started and they had a sign on front of store claiming they were closed. Which is fine, I completely understand. That being said, no one was answering the phone to tell people this. What I do not understand is the young guy at the counter yelling at me and other people and telling them they would get their money back in a couple of days. There were a lot of cars waiting outside on the phone. We never got our money back and called corporate multiple times. Months later and still no refund.

I would not recommend doing business with this particular Dominos. They need a heavy dose of class.

name: Sophia Hussain
text: Absolutely do not order from this Domino’s. My fiancé wanted to order pizza for a zoom game night with his family and not only was it 2 hours late from the 1.5 hours it spent in quality control, it was cold by the time it got to my house. Then both my fiancé and I got food poisoning. When I called the next day (May 28th) and spoke to Ned who promised me a refund. One week later my account was still charged. I reported it to corporate and they basically brushed it off and said they reported it to the local owner. There has been no action since. This place sucks.

name: American Patriot
text: Domino's is always good.

name: Adrian Lacey
text: Every time I order a pizza from this location, it always arrives cold. It takes over an hour for me the receive my order even though I live less than 10 minutes away. When I use the tracker, it always sits at “quality check” for at least 30 to 40 minutes. I have been very unhappy and will most likely never order from here again. I hate that it has come to this because normally I really enjoy Dominos.

name: Brandon Coffey
text: The folks at the Leeds location do a great job. The pizzas/cheesey breads are always cooked well (not soggy in middle or burnt crust) Good attention to odd special instructions. The deals are great for fast family dinners before or after a ballgame/practice.

name: Adrian Lacey
text: Every time I order a pizza from this location, it always arrives cold. It takes over an hour for me the receive my order even though I live less than 10 minutes away. When I use the tracker, it always sits at “quality check” for at least 30 to 40 minutes. I have been very unhappy and will most likely never order from here again. I hate that it has come to this because normally I really enjoy Dominos.

name: Michael Altman
text: Was left on hold for thirty minutes, I literally had to drive to the store with the phone still running, didn't even get a please hold. Went into the store with only one customer, I could here the phone ringing,they were just ignoring it this really upsets me  since I  am a regular customer

name: Richard Diamond
text: Easy peasy like always.

name: Ashley Lewis
text: Couldn’t order on the app because it said the store was closed (at 7:30pm on a Monday). I called to try and make an order and was on hold for 30 minutes. Cool. Papa Johns it is

name: grace alexis
text: Ordered 2 pizzas. The pizzas tasted ok but the pizzas were cut terribly. On one of them the edges were burnt.

name: Chris Batton
text: Got crust wrong and was home before I noticed

name: Jazzed MO
text: Cold medium pizza (supposed to have been a large)..and raw chicken wings

name: BloodOfCrimson Roll Tide
text: Food is great!! The staff is really friendly as well. The best part about it that my son has the opportunity to watch the process from start to finish.

name: Todd Sims
text: Placed order at 7pm and was told would be approximately an hour. Started calling them at 8:30 to find out where pizza was....no answer....called again at 9pm....no answer. Called again at 9:15 and just let it ring until they answered. Was told they would cancel my order and refund me within 2-3 business days. Told them I would be there the next day to get cash. Was also told my pizzas were never even made. Hang up the phone and 15 minutes later the driver calls and says he's in my driveway. Cold pizzas and all. Never again.

name: Denise Mayo
text: We ordered a five topping large pizza! It was ready when told! the toppings were great!  A large number and covered the whole pizza!

name: Tammi Hinds
text: Absolutely love their Philly steak Pizza and their Vegetarian Pizza.  Only issue is they need to offer Coke Zero instead of Diet Coke.

name: Lynn Reece
text: Every time I try to place an order over the phone for delivery, they always say they can't deliver it to me because my order wasn't enough money ($13.00).  However, I can immediately go online and place an order for the exact same thing I tried to order when I called and the order goes thru with no problem.  How is that possible?

name: crazy cat Lady
text: Got their cinnamon twists to try & a hand tosses pepperoni pizza, & those twists are heavenly!! Also got one of their Caesar salads to try & was surprised how good it was. Beautiful green lettuce with delicious chicken and shredded cheese! Very happy with my visit!

name: Star Stemas
text: Good quality, decent wait time. In and out in thirty minutes, and saved money because of the enployees sharing information on deals.

name: Wanda Monti
text: Wonderful place, I actually was standing in Little Caesars ordering my Hot Wings. Little Caesars allowed my order to go through for the wings and they didn't have any. So I ordered the wings from Domino's while standing in Little Caesars. And of course Domino's had just what I was wanting. Thank you Domino's for an awesome dinner

name: Chris Jones
text: Horrible, Horrible, Horrible. Tracker said order was ready at 611, got the at 622 to be informed my order was not ready. Did find out that two of the 4 were sitting there and also once I got home found that I had someone else's order, so half of my pder was sent to someone else so they had to remake mine. The girl at the counter acted like it was a task to help me or anyone else that walked in. Once I finally got the pizzas and returned home, well Walmart deli pizza is better than this. Two of the 4 were burnt, the cheese bread was burnt on the outside and not done on the inside. Each pizza barely had any sauce at all on them, you could not see it or taste it. Just a very bad experience all over. I usually love Dominoes but this is ridiculous.

name: Samantha Smith
text: Delivery driver was fast earlier than 30 minutes  good job

name: Taylor Madsen
text: This location is THE BEST!!! We just moved here and they were very nice, welcoming and informative on the current deals and specials. You can even watch them make the pizza!! The pizza and cheesy bread was BOMB! 10/10!!!

name: Amanda Tucker
text: This is my favorite Dominos. I order here online at least 3 to 4 times a week. Thank u crew for always having my order ready on time and hot.

name: Shawn Hamby
text: Its dominoes. No more ..no less.  Courteous though

name: Slater Brazeal
text: I love Domino's Pizza in general because they are moderately priced and their Domino's app and rewards program makes ordering Pizza extra awesome! While I have never had any issues with product quality from this location on several occasions the pizza has been extremely late the last time my pizza tracker said my food had arrived when it had not and when I tried to call the store no one answered... Finally 20 minutes after my pizza "had arrived" my driver finally pulled up. He was polite but offered no apology.

name: Leslie
text: I always order from Domino's because I can watch how my order progresses, and they've always been nice to me. I would remove half a star because sometimes they under cook my pan pizzas. I like them crispy. But full credit for effort! :)

name: Lexi Williams
text: I’ve been waiting on my order for an hour and a half I call and guy yells saying I’m waiting on a driver still my pizza isn’t here and I payed 41 dollars for two pizzas

name: Joshua Dodson
text: The worst dominos i have ever they hung up in the midfle of me ordering my food dosnt take 50s or 100 doller bills the manager is rude as hell when i called to get the general managers number she wouldnt even tell me by far the worst dominos experience of my life

name: Minis Tirith
text: Trash service. All I can say.

name: Ericka Byers
text: My pizza is always good from here.

name: william powell
text: Still taste like cardboard with tomato sauce.

name: Melanie Payne
text: Deliciousness on thin crust! Had never had a Supreme on thin crust, and it was so much better than the thick crust version. Great service!

name: karen everett
text: Always get good service.

name: Alexis Colwell
text: pizza is always fresh tasting and hot when we pick it up. Has always been ready when we get there and no mistakes. We love the new deep dish pizza, so yummy!

name: Nickie DiMartino
text: Steak sub.... Very good

name: Matthew Pledger
text: Their driver kept almost $20 in change from my mother-in-law's order without her permission back in January 2018. She will never order again from Domino's (Cowabunga Pizza franchise from Atlanta) again. The previous local franchise owners took better care of their community than the Atlanta based Cowabunga ever will!!!

name: LRice 9018
text: Pizza was great tonight!

name: Emmerald Sado
text: Great place and always a deal

name: Austin Fondren
text: I would definitely dub this the highest quality pizza joint in the state.

name: Don Blackall
text: We ordered a pizza for delivery and it took the pizza place an entire hour just to prep it and another 3 just to get it to my house. I have no idea what has to go on in a management stand point here but something needs to change. Obviously things aren't working out if it takes 4 hours to get pizza delivered.

name: Jenn Cornwell
text: Ordered pizza and stuff at 7:26pm over an hour later still no pizza! Called on hold for over 17 minutes and never and answer or a call to say hey your pizza is gonna be late we are trying our best or something. Doesn’t make sense

name: Debra Cowan
text: Meat lovers was awesome..the 2nd pizza was to be thin crust n it wasnt. But roommate said it was still good. Live on Margeret, to far to drive back. Over all very good!

name: Bobby B
text: Their Philly Cheesesteak pizza is the best

name: Amylia Phillips
text: They stopped delivering to moody. I have been a loyal customer to this company. I always tipped well and even when they messed up my order I wouldn't be a bother. I am extremely unhappy with their new 9 minute rule.

name: Monica Montes
text: I like the quick service and the option to track the delivery using the “Tracker”. Drivers could be more fun when delivering, sometimes they don’t look happy.

name: Kelly Williamson
text: These guys rock. Food is always fresh, made correctly and on time (most of the time it's here early). ~Kelly W

name: Monica “Beautiful Moe” Henderson
text: The pizza was awful..it was full of grease. I took it back  the next day because It was night when I purchased it didn't feel like taking it back. They tried to give me a hard time about bringing it back..needless to say they gave me my money back 🤔

name: Tamika Miller
text: The staff are wonderful and the pizza is really good and their handmade pan crust is the best!

name: Vexing Devil
text: Pizzas were made correctly and on time every time I've been here. Couldn't give 5 stars tho, cuz they are very skimpy on the toppings and cheese

name: Tina Thomas
text: Just disappointed!  I finally convinced my husband to try Domino's again and our large Meatzza pizza was awful. I ordered online and watched the tracker to make sure we arrived on time to pick up our order.  He went in and had to wait almost 20 minutes to pick it up.  We opened it up at home and it hardly had any cheese on it after I ordered double cheese and paid for double cheese!  Also, very little meat and it was cold!  We only live about a mile from Domino's.  At least the bread twists were warm.   So disappointing.....guess no more Domino's now!

name: S M
text: They're okay, food sometimes takes a little longer than I'd like (45-70 minutes). Also even though they are less than 5 miles away it won't let me place the order online so I have to call. They know this, but when my order took over an hour last week they sent me a voucher as an apology and when I read it it's for a deal they already run and only for online orders which sucks. They do tend to over cook the food and a few of the employees are kind of unprofessional on the phone but all in all it's an average pizza joint so don't pay attention to the people judging so harshly. It's dominos not some high class restaurant guys.

name: Latonya Bowman
text: I'm not sure if they don't care what you order or if they are soooooo busy that they just cant get orders correct.

name: Alex Algiere
text: Always forgets to put hot sauce on my pizza, otherwise it's good.

name: Michael Howell
text: Every time I order late they cancel my order. You can’t order more than $25 on app for cash delivery. I order minimum of $300 a week from Pizza Hut in Moody. Receipts to prove it. This restaurant is hurting themselves by not accommodating this bar.

name: Cassandra Naylor
text: Clean store

name: Amanda Hatcher
text: I ordered over the phone. The man told me it would be 15 mins. When I got there they didn't have my pizzas. Also, they told me they couldn't take a $100 bill. Alot of people use cash over cards because of the identity theif. The guy that told me they didn't take 100's looked like he was high. I will not be back to that domino

name: Justin Gilbert
text: On time and very courteous!

name: Janet L Hunter
text: This was another awful experience and the last time I try to do business with Domino's pizza. I was told go to Sonic to get change for my order. Why didn't I avoid the hour wait and go to sonic to begin with? There very rude customer service. Slow and food suffers as well as customers with there bad attitude.

name: Seraphina Croi
text: Everything was excellent!

name: Uno Danger
text: It's was great they have the best pizza makers and managers

name: Kym Davis
text: Ordered online tonight after months of boycott because our last experience was terrible.  Second time our pizza, sandwich, and bread were over an hour later than the tracker said it would be (last time was 2 hours) paid for extra chicken was given THREE pieces on the entire sandwich. Pizza wasn't cut, was cold and our bread bites which were supposed to have 16 pieces only had 8..needless to say, we won't be ordering from here anymore.

name: Kim Evans
text: Always hot and fresh, courteous delivery staff.

name: Debbie Oden
text: Always willing to help and I get orders ontime.

name: Helen James
text: The food is always right, and it always tastes amazing.

name: Ben Jackson
text: Sometimes it's great pizza, sometimes it's not.

name: john Dawson
text: Great pizza as always..

name: Ashley Duarte
text:
Rude.felt really uncomfrontable .i can smell how ever i want .cannbis.pizza was poorly done .
hemplovepeace

name: C J
text: Ordered online over 2 hours ago and have no food and haven't heard anything from them. This isn't the first time that has happened, but it will be the last.

name: beardenjim
text: Pretty good pizza, staff is usually disoriented and slow, but the food is good.

name: Katy Southerland
text: I wish I could give this store zero stars. Food delivered literally an hour late with zero remorse. An incorrect order that was, not surprisingly, cold. No forks delivered with one salad when two salads were ordered. Wow. Wowwowwow.

name: T C
text: The customer service was not good. My order was sitting ready when I got there. The young lady wasn't paying attention I sat for 25 mins waiting. My food was cold, I am disappointed.

name: Clay Ingram
text: Took to long

name: Max Sessions
text: Great pizza, just not to fast

name: Kristi Biggs
text: Great

name: MEGATRON 6MO
text: Quick delivery

name: NonYa
text:
Manager is rude.
Do not order extra dipping sauces because you will no receive them. Happened 5 times.
And when you ask for them to bring the sauces the manager will act like it’s your fault because you ordered the sauces.

name: Louis Carson
text: Right on time

name: aaron wells
text: Not 50 off

name: kayla
text: always fast and nice

name: Erica Hansen
text: Awesome

name: Steve Weaver
text: Great pizzas

name: . Harris
text: Terrible service with 8+ employee's standing around looking stupid... Avoid this place if possible...

name: Antherio Dsouza
text: Always order for pickup saves you some pennies

name: Steve Weaver
text: Great pizzas

name: Anna Harmon
text: I mean, it's pizza, but not great pizza

name: Joel Hill
text: Good food

name: aaron wells
text: Not 50 off

name: Louis Carson
text: Right on time

name: Danny Heath
text: I just like there Pizza

name: Eddie Leuthauser
text: Excellent!

name: Erica Hansen
text: Awesome

text:
(Translated by Google) A pizza restaurant where cheese is art

name: Potraa Sin Rienda
text:
(Translated by Google) 👌 ♥ ️ Delicious the best! 💋🤷

name: akustaka
text:
(Translated by Google) God

(Original)
Gud

name: Paul Buhrmester
text: We were so very amazed and impressed by Mama Lottie's Pizza!! While googling places to eat while in Gulf Shores, we settled on pizza. This place had good reviews, so we drove on over. Our group of eleven dined in, even though it was a little bit warm inside. There service was great! The food looked, smelled, and tasted amazing! Handmade dough, and fresh start to finish. And you could tell by the traffic, that this pizza place is enjoyed by many locals. We'll make sure to come back whenever we're in town 😊

name: Airbrush Ink
text: Well I honestly don’t know how the food tastes.   The service however, isn’t the friendliest Ive experienced for sure.   Went by about two weeks ago around 2 o’clock walked in, and was immediately told they don’t open till 3 o’clock!    No other words were spoken as the woman returned to the back of the restaurant.   Even though the door has a pretty large sign that says open daily at 11am.   But ok no worries, come back around 3:30 today to get a couple of slices of pizza because heck it says pizza by the slice on the window as well.   But was told NOPE we only do pizza by the slice till 3.    Again nothing else was said.   But wait y’all open at 3 right!?    No suggestions on maybe a small pizza place r anything like that.   Hey no worries, I’ll take my hard earned money else where.   Best of luck.

name: Jennifer Ewan
text: We ordered 7 pizzas for delivery. The girl on the phone was SUPER nice & let me know it would be an hour & a half. We expected a long wait due to how busy every place in town had been, so that was no big deal. Pizza was delivered a bit early & was absolutely delicious. The delivery lady was also very nice. We'll definitely be repeat customers!

name: Sarah Moss
text: Amazing pizza!  Kind and helpful staff.

resp.text: Sarah, thank you for swinging by! Hope you come back our way. -Devin, Manager

name: Haplo One
text: Best meal we had while in GF!  The first as well.  Within walking distance of the condo, and the staff was very friendly.  They were very busy but the pie was ready quickly and was pretty damn good.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Haplo, thanks so much for taking a quick walk to come see us. We're happy to have extended a warm welcome to Gulf Shores with a delicious slice. Hope to see you back many more times! -Devin, Manager

name: Mark Masavage
text:
Great pizza and better service.

We arrived to the area late Saturday and ordered pizza from papa John's. They told us it would be ready in 20 mins, but when we went to pick it up, they told us 2hrs. I cancelled the order, and when driving back to the condo, I spotted Mama Lottie's. I stopped in, in hopes they were still taking orders. Unfortunately, they stopped taking orders 2hrs before, but were still making carry outs!

Even though I did not leave with a pizza, I left with a smile, because of the great attitude of the people working.

Because of this experience, we ordered  Mama Lottie's on Thursday. They said it would be ready in 30min. It was, and the service was just as friendly. The pizza was very good, as well.

resp.text: Mark, we're so glad we were able to turn your pizza experience around! Thanks for spotting us and giving us a shot to impress you. The next time you're in the area, we'll have a pizza pie with your name on it! -Devin, Manager

name: jason allman
text: Food is amazing. Prices are very reasonable. People that work there are very friendly. I highly recommend them.

name: Jon Moor
text: Not a bad pizza. Fresh ingredients always a plus+!

resp.text: Jon, it's great you could visit us! We'd love to have you back our way soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Josh Lea
text: We are locals and this is our pizza spot. Every time we have family visiting we order Momma Lottis and they are blown away! Eat here! You won’t be disappointed

resp.text: Josh, we're honored to have you as one of our regulars. It's always a pleasure to serve you. See you back the next time you're craving a slice. -Devin, Manager

name: Jon Moor
text: Not a bad pizza. Fresh ingredients always a plus+!

resp.text: Jon, it's great you could visit us! We'd love to have you back our way soon. -Devin, Manager

name: David Rodriquez
text: Just average, average price ($22.00  18" supreme), ample cheese, skimpy on toppings but everything was fresh. All in all, I would try somewhere else.

resp.text: David, we're sorry to hear that we didn't blow you away with flavor. We would have loved to have been told so we could have offered you up something else you might have liked better. Next time, we'd certainly love to make a suggestion. Hope to see you again. -Devin, Manager

name: Diana Olkowski
text: Great pizza and fast delivery! Top notch service. We enjoyed it!

resp.text: Diana, nothing beats getting a hot slice of ooey gooey pizza right to your door. Thanks for ordering from us -- see you again soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Joe Johnson
text: Good pizza.  Great price.... especially for the area

resp.text: Joe, happy to hear you can always count on us for a slice done right. You're always welcome back whenever you're close by. See you soon! -Devin, Manager

name: clayton nicholson
text: Great pizza! Even when they are covered up on a Friday night they don't skip on quality.

resp.text: Clayton, nothing better than to end your week with a delicious slice. Thanks for braving the crowd to grab some with us. Hope to see you back for some more the next time the craving strikes! See you soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Josh Keers
text: Love the customer service., and is must if you are in Gulfshores AL.

resp.text: Josh, thanks for always making us a stop whenever you're in town. It's a joy to serve you. Hope to see you back for another slice soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Gary Eaves
text: A lot of places claim to have “New York Style” Pizza.....Then you end up with something not even close! Well we just tried this place for the first time, and they aren't kidding! Delicious thin crust, great quality toppings and lots of them....We had the Meat lovers with extra cheese and it was truly on point....I normally eat three slices of pizza, but I maxed out with two of theirs....Absolutely the best pizza Ive had in Gulf Shores! Mama’s just became our “Go to” Pizza house! And the young lady that delivered our Pizza was outstanding!

resp.text: Gary, we're glad we held up our end of the deal when it comes to authentic 'New York Style' pizza. Meat lovers certainly is a crowd pleaser when it's done right -- adding extra cheese on top was the right move! Can't wait to see you back again and again for another pizza pie. -Devin, Manager

name: Maureen Doubleday
text: We had gluten free cauliflower crust pizza and it was amazing. The staff was very friendly and fun, service was fast. We had our pizza in 10 minutes. This will most definitely be our go to pizza place.

resp.text: Maureen, no matter how you eat, you should be able to enjoy delicious pizza! Thanks for checking us and our cauliflower crust out -- so glad you loved it! Can't wait to see you back again soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Mud Zombie
text:
SUCH GOOD PIZZA!

We are on vacation and looking for a place that would deliver out to the end of Fort Morgan. Every pizza place told me no but Mama Lotties actually offered to drive it to the Chevron and meet me.
Beyond that, the pizza is incredible! Such delicious crust, plenty of cheese and a very good sauce! We got the pepperoni and cheese and the cheese lovers. The pepperoni and cheese is one of the best I have ever had before and the cheese lovers was like nothing I’ve ever had on a pizza before. If you love feta and ricotta cheese it’s a must try for sure!
If you’re in the Gulf Shores area you MUST try Mama Lotties!

name: Keila Quiles
text: Ok pizza not a lot of flavor. Wouldn't eat it again. Chicago pizza is the best.

resp.text: Keila, we're sorry to hear our style pizza wasn't for you. We understand that there are so many different kinds and we may not be for everyone. We appreciate you checking us out though! -Devin, Manager

name: Kait Levin
text: Great fresh pizza! We got the Margherita with pepperoni and the crust was nice and crunchy and the herbs were fresh.

resp.text: Kait, delicious choice -- happy to hear you loved it! We only use the best ingredients. Looking forward to serving you up another pizza pie soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Denise L
text: Mama lotties house special pizza is amazing! Will definitely be my go to pizza from now on!!

resp.text: Denise, we're honored to snag that number one spot in your heart. It's a pleasure to serve you up a delicious pizza pie. See you back soon enough! -Devin, Manager

name: gmoneysbaby
text: The pizza is amazing. Eat at the Gulf Shores location every monday for lunch! For $5.99+tax you get 2 giant slices and a drink. Love the staff that's in there. DeeDee is the sweetest ever and makes some the best sweet tea! Love these guys 😍.

resp.text: What an amazing tradition to kick your week off right! We're always so happy to see you walk through our doors. See you this upcoming Monday for your slices! -Devin, Manager

name: Phil Morgan
text: My goto pizza. And they have gluten-free pizza.

resp.text: Thanks so much for joining us, Phil! Hoping to see you here in the future. -Devin, Manager

name: Aaron Liebo
text: All three employees were without masks, regardless of the state requirement. Very frustrating and disappointing. Go to Mellow Mushroom instead.

name: Viola Harvey
text: For ten years I've held the opinion that Zachary's is better than Little Star but tonight I'm not so sure. The classic deep dish was fantastic. AND the chicken wings are the best I can remember eating. Bonus.

name: John Haynes
text: Took a long time (2.5 hrs), but person taking the order was upfront and warned me it would take that long. To be fair, order was on a Sat night (move in day) in a beach town. They called me when pies were coming out of the oven. Had a twenty minute drive back to where we were staying, so wasn’t hot when we got there. Not their fault, and I imagine I could’ve gone 4.5 stars if I had been eating it right out of the oven. Prices were reasonable.

name: debby mcnicol
text: The pizza was great, the people were so friendly.  I will be back

resp.text: Debby, nothing beats a slice done right. Thanks for putting your faith in us and letting us deliver. Can't wait to welcome you back in for another pizza pie soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Steven Edwards
text: The pizza place we frequented while vacationing in Gulf Shores closed down so we've been looking for a new one. I think we've found it in Mama Lottie's. Excellent pizza, fresh and light, not greasy or heavy. Also ordered a large Cesar salad which was very good.

name: Hannah Lamborghini
text: The cheese sticks were AMAZING! The staff was very kind as well. 10/10 Recommend coming back again. The wait is like 14 minutes for a pizza but it’s so good.

name: Stephen Wardle
text: Solid pizza. The toppings are good and pizza tasted freshly made. The crust is a little weak to me. Rest was great.

name: Dennis Morgan
text: Surprisingly very good pizza.  It passed the crust flop test and the zaaaaa was delicious.  Better than a lot of pizzas in Chicago.

name: Cheryl Daves
text: Ordered the Long Island. It was tasty however it needed cheese on it. There just wasn't enough. We ordered an 18 in and it barely fed 3 people because it was so light. I'm from NY and I know pizza. I'd say this place is ok for a snack. Wasn't crazy about the dough. The fresh garlic is what made it ok.

name: Pete Belanger
text: Great pan style pizza.

resp.text: Appreciate you stopping by, Pete! Hope you make it back our way. -Devin, Manager

name: Mary Watkins
text: Great Service and great pizza and cheese sticks.  We were only in the city for 1 night.  So worth the wait (very busy night).  The called me when our order was done sooner than quoted.  Highly recommend!!

name: Jordon Hargrove
text:
Was able to order delivery to. Local campground so that was cool.  They were polite on the phone, and they showed up in like 25 minutes.

The pizza, meat lovers, was above average.  The calzone was amazing.

The wife and daughter had the manicotti and it was good, but cooler cold when it arrived.  We were able to warm it up in the microwave so not the end of the world.

Bread sticks where too dry and fluffy for our tastes, but that could just be us.

Would order pizza from them again.

name: Keith Williams
text: Great food and very friendly staff. Highly recommend for anyone who enjoys quality pizza at an affordable price. Wish there was a place this good where I live.

name: Ali Bacon
text: Delicious pizza, hot and tasty. Will definitely be back.

resp.text: Ali, nothing quite beats a great slice of pizza! So glad you love ours. Hope to see you back in soon! -Devin, Manager

name: Whitney Thrasher
text:
1. Great staff ! Very friendly, quick , and refills drinks quickly
2. Great prices !
3. The pizza is AMAZING !!!! We got a simple cheese pizza and it was AMAZING :)

DEFINITELY will be back the next time we're in gulf shores!!!!

name: Sue Maysonet
text: Excellent service, the pizza had great taste!

name: Lyndsey Howard
text: Delivery.com canceled our order after waiting almost 2 hours. We called Mama Lotties directly and got our pizza within 20 minutes. (We had to go pick it up, but that was fine.) Super friendly and much cheaper than ordering thru delivery.com. Pizza and cheese sticks were awesome.

name: Dustin Sayre
text: Great pizza excellent staff! They are always nice and friendly. The pizza is very tasty and not too stiff and not to soft just right. I eat here at least once a week and several of my employees do as well.

name: Alex Resendez
text: Pizza was on point and my wife's calzone was definitely to her liking. Staff was very nice and attentive also observed covid 19 protocols. Will definitely be going back for a pizza again.

name: Joan Pruden
text: Pizza is SO GOOD!! The wait is a bit long because they make pizzas fresh but the wait is worth it!!

name: Ashley Bullard
text: Me and my family walked in at 9:30pm and was told we could only order to go. There website & front door clearly states open until 11:00pm. Poor customer service and lacking in respect for families who are on vacation trying to have a good dining in experience.

name: Crystal Purvis
text: We eat here every trip we make to the beach and we've never been disappointed.

name: Shaneil Yarbrough
text: The staff were friendly and attentive. We started with breadsticks for the table and then enjoyed veggie, meatlovers, supreme, and philly steak individually. The food was good and served hot! We would definitely return.

name: Chris Denio
text: Friendly service and good pizza  !

resp.text: Chris, thanks for your review! We hope you'll be back again soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Dave Wilson
text: Pizza was very good. A little pricy and under the advertised size which makes it really pricy. That being said the crust is very good, the sauce is very good and the toppings were quality. The service was good and friendly. I would rank it the 2nd best pizza in the area only behind Vitolli's Pizza in Robertsdale.

name: Dustin Scarborough
text: We were referred by friends and we now call for take out at least once a week! If you want a quality pizza and a nice fresh salad this is your place!

name: Cam Sweat
text: Great food! Great prices for the amount of food and WONDERFUL staff! definitely recommend

name: Brandon Styles Live
text: Great place for pizza by the slice!

resp.text: It's great you enjoyed stopping by, Brandon! See you next time. -Devin, Manager

name: angie parr
text: The pizza was delicious!!!

name: Jennifer Lechleitner
text: Super friendly staff. I had the gluten free pizza and it was delicious. The guy who works there told me it’s a cauliflower crust (doesn’t taste like it but it’s delicious so I don’t really care what it is). No complaints.

name: George Ruper
text: Delicious pizza and cheese bread sticks. The young gentleman that waited on us was the best! We will definitely come here again next year.

name: Stephen Jenkins
text: Great pizza kids loved it.  Gluten free crust was delicious.

name: Kelli Johnson
text: Best cheese sticks I've ever had. They we're very thin and not all doughy and had lots of cheese and the garlic butter on them was so good too!! Pizza crust was thin and sauce was light and had a great flavor. Owner and staff very nice. We will be back for sure!

name: Anthony Lochrico
text: Cricos Pizza is way better

resp.text: Anthony, we're sorry to hear you weren't a fan of us. We understand that food is subjective and that our menu won't knock it out of the park for every single person. We're happy you've found a place you love! If you're ever back with us, ask for a suggestion -- we'd love to serve you something delicious! -Devin, Manager

name: David Lloyd
text: I love the lunch special. A pizza is always hot and fresh. The staff is friendly.It is in a convenient location to my work into my home. I recommend eating at this restaurant.

name: Lela Pollan
text: We ordered 14 pizzas for my son's wedding rehearsal dinner on 04/12/19.Devin the manager and his team were awesome. They delivered the pizza on time and was labeled as we requested. Everyone loved the pizza, there was none left over. I would highly recommend for your next event. Devin and his team were very friendly and the best customer service I've experienced in a while. Can't wait to go back to Mama Lotties for the best pizza in the South. Thanks guys for making our rehearsal dinner a huge success!!!

name: Jackson Chism
text: We were visiting Gulf Shores and were wanting something other than a chain pizza place. Pizza was incredible! Huge, New York style slices! Expect a little bit longer of a wait than your chain places, but it is absolutely worth it!

name: JulzDave Shute
text: Absolutely the best Italian (Pizza plus all the rest) Place here at the beach .. the secret is in the sauce and it will melt in your mouth! They also offer several Gluten-Free Pizza options and they taste just as good! A little pricier but you will not regret it. I used to live in Italy and this is the closest place I've ever had for true Italian food.

name: Nancy Litch
text: Very good pizza

resp.text: We're so glad you joined us, Nancy! We hope we'll see you here in the future. -Devin, Manager

name: Special Touch Restoration
text: Best pizza in town....

resp.text: Thanks so much for this excellent review! We hope you'll be coming back soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Jamie Dugger
text: Amazing! Perfect little family owned joint. Food was awesome! Staff was great! Highly recommend!

name: Layne Watts
text: I wish I knew the names of the folks who work here to shout them out. We stopped by on a Friday night and were their final order of that day. The margherita pizza was incredible! I'm a pizza fiend and enjoyed it greatly. I highly recommend fellow pizza fiends to check it out because it was simply full of flavor. The cannolis were excellent as well. If I'm ever back in the area, I'm definitely returning here!

name: Katie Colbert
text: Great food, reasonable prices. You will not regret treating yourself here. Pizza, pasta, salad. And the service is amazing! 🤗🍕🥗🍝🍕

name: Lori Bittle
text: Best pizza on the beach . Lovely staff . Owner Andy Joseph is hands on w his very impressive staff . Just wondering where the lovely Lori Bittle went

name: Jane Maenner
text: Pizza was full of veggies, but had little real Italian spices or herbs.  Lots of cheese though.

name: Rastalyfe Reggae
text: The best pizza in gulf shore. Me and my wife felt right at home. The Buffalo ranch Pizza is my all-time favorite

name: Shelda Deits
text: Everything is wonderful.

resp.text: Shelda, we're glad you had a great visit! We hope to see you in the future. -Devin, Manager

name: Trent Merritt
text: This is an awesome place with great people let you guys working there even though they're about to close still made me my food and cut up and joke with me the whole time I was sitting there waiting for it to get done like they've known me for years anytime I I come down here I will be going back

name: Adam Orgeron
text: Fantastic,  absolutely fantastic pizza. PSA, this isn't pizza hut or the likes. These are handmade pizzas send take time to make. It's not 30 minutes are your pizza is free. It takes a little time for them to make a large order, but OMG worth every second of wait time.

name: Katie Colbert
text: Great food, reasonable prices. You will not regret treating yourself here. Pizza, pasta, salad. And the service is amazing! 🤗🍕🥗🍝🍕

name: Adele Briggs
text: Awesome pizza and service! Definitely will be back. By far my favorite pizza so far in this area.

name: Tina Nelson
text: Great food and clean nice atmosphere!!

name: Sande Campbell
text: Best pizza around this area. Try it, you'll love it!!

name: Stephen Crittenden
text: Great pizza!! Great Service!

name: Mary Edwards
text: Great keto pizza! As a local, my favorite pizza place by far! I highly recommend!

name: Holly Stubblefield
text: Friendly staff and great food

resp.text: We're really glad you could swing by, Holly! Hoping we'll see you back again soon. -Devin, Manager

name: Ben Scholl
text: Waited 1 he when told it was going to be 30 mins, all just for them to not even get the order right both pizzas were wrong

name: Cristina Gregory
text: Best Italian food on the island! Im addicted to the Volcano Bread. Way better than Pappa Rocco's, but I wish Mama Lotties served beer or wine. 🍻🍷 (local)

name: Larry D. Yarbrough
text: This food is excellent with friendly service!

name: Carol
text:
The BEST spaghetti and meatballs I have ever had!!
The pizza is delicious also!

name: Becky D
text: Great deal on slices! Friendly service, good pizza, and paper tablecloths for coloring on.

name: Betty Pappert
text: Best Calzone around!  Awesome staff and great food

name: Donna Hannah
text: The best Italian food I've eaten around here !!!! Great guys who work there too .

name: Jen Scott
text: Best pizza and Greek salad in a long time. Very cheesy and the dough was awesome.Greek salad needs some Greek peppers( just my preference), but my hostess and server "Love" and her partner in crime in the kitchen "hooked me up" with an excellent salad! Quick, friendly and delish hole in the wall. Love those lil places!!! Thanks guys, keep up the great work, giving the fast and yummy experience, and serving food hot and drinks cold!

name: zachary Stanley
text: Alfredo Pasta is the really flavorless

name: Jimbo Turrittin
text: They always do great pizza, especially when Devins is on.

name: jean buse
text: Very good pizza. I will recommend this place to my family and friends. Staff was very friendly.

name: Emilia Osorio
text: Amazon pizza and great customer service.

name: Angela Calascione
text: Love the pizza. Friendly service.

name: Barbara Hobbs
text:
Went in for a pizza and some manicotti- maybe a cannoli...
manicotti was non-existant  so switched to getting spaghetti and meatballs- would take 30 minutes to make-

So we went to another Italian place around the corner- we live here year round- we won’t go back there...

name: Jamie Dugger
text: Awesome little place! Love love love the food and atmosphere!

name: Jaclyn Belt
text: Great service and great food. Will definitely be going back! Loved it.

name: Patrick White
text: Great food and service, highly recommend 👍👍👍👍💪

name: Blake Bishop
text: Affordable little pizza shop, they even have gluten free pizza, great place to enjoy.

name: Jimmy Clark
text: Good service and quality food

name: Chad Potts
text: Friendly staff, great pizza.

name: Laura Braun
text: Good pizza and pasta and the guys working were really nice.

name: ID360 Media
text: Very friendly staff. Pizza served hot and fresh.

name: Sara Salazar
text: Just a little hole in the wall with some great pizza!

name: jill caddell
text: Great pizza!!! Personable staff and it was done in 12 minutes, perfect!

name: Natessa Marshall

text: We have patronized them for 20+yrs.! We have always favored the Ultimate Supreme. We always paid $9.00, almost a year ago the price went to $12.00. When I asked why, I was told they had increased the toppings. Well they didn't lie, a lot more bell peppers, some as long as my finger and as wide as two fingers. And onions, chunks of onion, never separated, just chunks! I took one slice and picked off the onions and peppers, that amounted to a heaping hand full! What was left was a slice with a single slice of pepperoni and about 3peices of sausage and very little cheese. The pizza had no taste other than a watery taste! They should name it the vegan bell pepper and onion TASTELESS PIZZA! As long time customers, needless to say we are very dissapointed! Other pizza resteraunts are pulling similar stunts! So we will not be patronizing little Little Caesars any more! Also the most cheese and peperroni, tastes like it was made with processed cheese covered with a little mozzarella, and few if any more peperroni! It will not melt the cheese when reheated! Thank you for your PAST SERVICE!

name: M. Connell
text: We got the opportunity to visit this Papa Murphy's location on a recent trip to Birmingham.  Excellent!  We snuck in right before closing and were nicely greeted.  We chose our favorite, the vegetarian pizza.  The white sauce is so yummy, and is one of the special choices that makes this chain great.  It's on about 1/2 of the pizza choices.  Another selling point of this chain is the ability to customize your pizza.  Lots of ingredients you don't see else where- like artichoke hearts. We didn't make the pizza until the next evening's dinner, and it still baked up great - flavorful crust rose nicely and then that great crispy on the outside, somewhat soft on the inside finish.  Wonderful pizza with lots of choices.

text: I am beyond disappointed, I put my order in online for delivery at 6:30pm. My 3 small children patiently waited at the door for the pizza man. I'm certain it is because of the neighborhood, which I considered after the fact. I'm okay with them not delivering here, in fact I would have gladly given my $15 tip to the person who prepared my order had they just called and said.... We don't deliver there but we would be happy to prepare your order for pickup ( my husband was already out picking up my chinese, which will be cold by the time I eat because I refuse to eat without my children.) I might live in a budget friendly not so appealing possibly dangerous neighborhood but I'm a good customer, I tip well and I appreciate the courtesy of the places I give my money.

name: Chris F. - iamd4g
text: Even their reply is fake and auto-generated like their b🤬🤬🤬t pizza and service. There will be no "next time" BOTTOM DOLLAR ON THAT. Horrible experiences at this locations but tonight's interaction burns bridges. Granted, there was inclement weather tonight so some delay and difficulties were expected. However, from what I experienced tonight, Domino's Pizza off of Mobile Hwy would have been better closed. No matter, I ordered from the app and request delivery. I finalized the order on the app but I later received a call from the store, saying they didn't have delivery drivers (again, expected difficulties) and I need to pick up my food. What they didn't tell me is that they voided my app order, placing a hold on my debit card (upcoming 'last straw'), and I would need to bring my debit card to re-order. So, when I arrived at the store, lo and behold. They told me that I needed my card. Thus, I had to drive back through Tropical Storm Sally in a partially wrecked car, just to get my debit card. (Now, given my past dealings with this store, I should have know better but I am a naive person person at times.) I get back to the store, just to find out that because of the order I made on the app, Domino's Pizza tried to charge me twice for the same order. One for delivery and the other for carryout. I snapped. So what? I need to have at least 40 dollars in my bank account to order pizza. I am sorry; your tax dollars don't pay teachers enough for that. I find it really funny that Domino's Pizza can jump into your bank account so fast when you order but, refunding and correcting orders, they feint as bumbling idiots. I do not just hold the store at fault but the entire corporation. They have no regard for customer service; Domino's Pizza only cares about profits and their shareholders. I wouldn't drop or invest a dime into Domino's Pizza, with all the dried and burnt pizzas I have ordered over the years. Hell, Pizza Hut has a hotline for situations like this, but you invest your time in 'Pizza Insurance' and 'HotSpots'. How about fairly selling pizza when trying to double dip into people's bank accounts? How about optimizing your systems so errors like this can fixed quicker? Just go under, already. But, before you do, give me my money back because YOU STILL HAVE NOT DONE THAT YET FOR A ORDER I CAN NOT EAT BECAUSE I NEVER RECEIVED IT!

resp.text: Hello Chris, I apologize for your experience and would like to assure you that this is not an automated response and your review is individually read and responded to because we want to make sure your concerns are addressed.
