We preach food safety, regular hand washing, and sanitation practices in our stores as well. If you would still feel more comfortable with us wearing gloves when preparing your pizza we are glad to wear gloves upon your request. Our team appreciates your valued feedback and we hope you have a wonderful day.

text: Here we go again. Stopped using Domino's a couple of years ago because of their poor customer service. Figured that they had two years to fix it, I'd give them a try. It is about 8 minutes from the store to my office. 1:00 pm, no pizza, 1:10 pm no pizza, 1:25 pm, still no pizza. Called the store. Only have one driver but it'll be out shortly. (Maybe Domino's should consider giving their drivers a living wage so they would stay).1:40 pm, pizza finally shows up at my office. The driver gave me my now cold pizza and seemed a bit miffed that I failed to leave a tip.  Guess I'll wait two more years. EDIT: 5-23-2019 Just got off the phone with a woman who identified herself as the "manager on duty"  per the response from the "owner" I called the number listed and explained that I  was asked to call regarding my order (#19 placed 5-3-19)  but twas told there is no record of it.  Yep, great customer service.

name: Tevin Bryant
text:
First, I am a big fan of Domino's Pizza; I will purchase it about every other week. Yesterday, I was passing through Montgomery and went to this location to get pizza and the cinnamon bread twists. The chicken and spinach pizza might as well have been just a cheese pizza; had either a piece of chicken or spinach on every other slice.

Second,  the cinnamon bread twists are usually a favorite of mine, but last night's order was horrendous. The bread twists were a quarter of the size they usually are and were hard as rocks.

This location was the dirtiest and most unpleasing Domino's I have ever been to. I highly recommend going out of your way to order from a different location.

text: My boyfriend and I ordered a pizza from this location tonight and ONCE AGAIN!!!! HORRIBLE SERVICE!!! I recorded both calls that I made for corporate office to hear. Although the pizza tracker showed it at quality check phase (the last phase before delivery), I get a dead air call no one said anything. So I called back and get an answer from a rude Adrian screaming and cutting me off because I questioned him about waiting 30minutes to call me to tell me they don't deliver in my area after dark. In which I just received a delivery from them about a week or 2 at this hour ago so I guess it's a new policy, So why was I able to place an order and why was I charged and again 30MINUTES before you call knowing you have an online tracker indicating the steps of my delivery??????? Don't waste your time dealing with these people. It's a hit or miss on the quality of your service or if you'll get your food at all. BUT YOU WILL BE CHARGED!!!!!!This is the last my friends or family will be using them now I have to wait 2-3 business days to get my money back. This is pathetic . BEWARE!!!!!!! SHITTY SERVICE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

text: If I could give this Dominos 0 stars I would. I had to wait for 15 min for them to answer the phone and when they did they just sat the phone down while I heard them laughing in the background. I called back I asked what were the specials I was placed on hold again, after about 5 min the girl finally came back to the phone I placed my order she told me we will get it to you when we can, after an hour passed we called back and were put on hold another women came to the phone and said the delivery driver was on her way. I waited another hour and forty minutes, no pizza I proceeded to call over and over again they would not answer the phone. The 2 women that I spoke to need to be fired I waited from 3 to 7 at night and needless to say I never received my pizza. This is truly bad business and very unprofessional. I will never eat at Dominos again if this is how you allow your employees to treat customers

name: M Elizabeth
text: This location is so nasty. I love the one in Phenix City and I'm here visiting family and I'm like 'let's get marcos it is so good' and then this ome ended up being nasty. Super soggy and hella greasy.

resp.text: Hi, There. We are disappointed to hear this and we always want you to receive a meal that exceeds your expectations. Please tell us more at www.tellmarcos.com.

name: Danielle Christopher
text: It doesn’t make sense to be open until 11pm. I specifically called at 10:30 to order a cheese pizza and the guy told me that I couldn’t over the phone and that I had to walk in. So I walk in 2 mins later and he said we’re no longer taking orders and it’s 10:35pm. He then proceeded to say that they were not taking orders at 10:30pm or later, but failed to relay that to me over the phone. Regardless it’s says they close at 11pm so why was my order not taken???

resp.text: Hi, Danielle. Please give us a chance to make it right and fill out a feedback form at www.tellmarcos.com.

name: Brandy Mayhand
text: First time ordering from here. They have the best pizza!! I love the pepperoni they use on the pizza. Will definitely be ordering again.

resp.text: Hey there! Thanks so much for the great feedback—so glad to see it!

name: Jeff Whitlock
text: Placed and paid for pizza over the phone. Went to pick up pizza, lady said it was $3. I asked why, it was paid for over the phone. I paid the $3 but she could not explain to me why I had to pay an additional $3. Pizza was greasy!!!

resp.text: Hi, Jeff. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We're so sorry we let you down and we'd like to look into this. Please provide your contact information on our feedback form at www.tellmarcos.com

name: Miguel Torres Salazar
text: I ordered a pizza that never arrive because they delivered my pizza to a different location (my address was right all the time). I called them to get a refound and they told me there's nothing they can do. They just stole my money, greaaat!

resp.text: Hello, Miguel. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We're so sorry we let you down and we'd like to look into this. Please provide your contact information on our feedback form at www.tellmarcos.com

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great feedback, Russel—so glad to see it!

name: Kelly Poole
text: Delicious pizza and super yummy desserts!!! Perfect for those nights you don’t want to cook and have dinner delivered right to your door!!

resp.text: Hey there! Thanks so much for the great feedback—so glad to hear it!

name: Michelle Pegues
text: Good food and good customer service

resp.text: Hi, Michelle. Thank you so much for the great feedback—so glad to see it!

name: Benjamin Meade
text: They make good pizza here. This location can get very busy during game times (as expected)  but the staff could really do a much better job handling the volume and providing better customer service for people waiting.  Seems like I was more of an inconvenience than a welcome guest on a busy busy day. Otherwise they do a good job.

resp.text: Benjamin, we’re so sorry that we let you down. Please fill out a feedback form at www.marcosguestfeedback.com so we can have someone reach out to you directly and make things right.

name: Leonidas Carpenter
text: Great pizza! Great staff! I went in to pick up a carryout order and the pizza was still in the oven. Guy at the counter said I could wait in the car and he would bring it to me, which he did.

resp.text: Hi, Justin. We love our pizza too!  Thanks for letting us know.

name: Bradis Worthington
text: Marco’s hands down has the best pizza as well as the fastest delivery time. Regardless of what time you order, your pizza will always be delivered fresh in a timely manner. I can’t recommend this place enough!

resp.text: Thanks for the love, Bradis!

name: S K
text: Tasty large pizza with plenty of toppings. Price are pretty reasonable. Quite greasy and strong for me, I should try different toppings next time. I recommend this to people who likes strong taste of their pizza.

resp.text: We're so happy you had an excellent experience! Thanks for the review! We really appreciate it.

name: Lauren Bradfield
text: delicious pizza and considerate managers and staff!

resp.text: Hey, there. We're so happy you had an excellent experience! Thanks for the review! We really appreciate it!

name: Cassie And yes its my real color
text: I've been to the Opelika and now this location. Love both!! Employees are always so nice and I always get my order fast, hot, and correct.

resp.text: We're so happy you had an excellent experience! Thanks for the review! We really appreciate it, Cassie!

name: Shirez
text: Great pizza and friendly staff at every location I've been to.

resp.text: Hi Shirez, thanks for the great feedback - so glad to hear you had a good experience!

name: Mohamed Abdalla
text: Best Pizza in Auburn. Prepare to pay extra compared to other Pizza joints in Auburn, but it is definitely worth it!

resp.text: Hi Mohamed, thanks so much for letting us know! We’re glad you had a great experience!

name: Cindy Gulledge
text: The pizza  was delicious! Delivery was fast! Delivery guy was friendly both times. I'm very happy with my Marcos experience and recommend it highly.

resp.text: As long as you're happy, we're happy, Cindy!

name: James Joyce
text: Though on the pricier side, Marco's is noticably better than other quick service pizza. This location is consistently great - accurate, fast, and not skimpy on toppings. I have to give credit to the owner, who I've spoken to once (on a Saturday, via his personal cell phone, of all things) after submitting some feedback about the corporate-run online ordering system. This person clearly cares about customer service and it's reflected in how well his franchise is run. My only complaint is they're not open later.

name: James Joyce
text: Though on the pricier side, Marco's is noticably better than other quick service pizza. This location is consistently great - accurate, fast, and not skimpy on toppings. resp.text: Hi, there. Thanks for the great feedback—so glad to hear you had a good experience!

name: Conrad Lynch
text: Great pizza and even better service. They forgot to deliver our salad with our pizza and the delivery guy drove back to the store to get it. On top of that they refunded us for the whole meal. They surpassed our expectations. Great customer service!

name: Devin Gibson
text: Great pizza, great ownership.

resp.text: Hi, Devin.  Thanks for the great feedback – so glad to hear you had a good experience!

name: David Ihde
text: Went here for take-out with my two grandchildren (one in a stroller).  My order was ready when I arrived and even though we were walking the girl at the counter offered to help us carry the order to our car (she didn't know we were walking).  She was friendly and made us feel welcome.  When we got the pizza's home I thought they were a little salty, but maybe that's just Marco's style of pizza.  I'll probably go here again and would recommend it to people.

name: Julia Reagan
text: You get a coupon for large 3 topping pizza, them tax, $3.25 delivery for 1 block, then still have to tip?? ridiculous.  Pizza order was wrong too. Tried since they opened to patronize, but so many issues over the years...

resp.text: Julia, we’re so sorry that we let you down. Please fill out a feedback form at www.marcosguestfeedback.com so we can have someone reach out to you directly and make things right.

Marcos' sauce has a unique tangyness most others don't and the meat and seasoning was perfect. The pizza arrived hot like it just came from the oven.
5 Stars for beating Dominos' and Papa's John all to pieces!

text: I've been a customer at Marco's since it's opened. For whatever reason there service has sucked. Like big time sucked. My pizza tonight was a hour and a half late. I called to ask where it was and was told "what do you want me to do about it! It was the start of school". I'm sorry, but that is not an appropriate response to my question. The quality of service is so awful lately, I'm not sure if there has been a shift on the management or the owner is just lacking in his duties, but I am beyond displeased with the service I received tonight.

name: K O
text:
This place is the worse at making pizza.  They never put enough cheese and they always overcook and we have to tare pieces apart as the cuts never go through all the way.  There are usually lots of bubbles in the dough too.
I prefer to drive across town to the other one in Alabama city.  They are extremely slow  but MOST of the time the pizza is better quality.

name: Hudson Ellis
text: Very good food. Never had a problem with any staff or food. Keep up the good work!

name: Bill Roberts
text: Always great. Fast service with hot to go and this location actually has parmesan cheese!

name: TigerFury007
text: It’s ok but cheap is cheap might as well pay the extra and get dominoes, or papa John’s. Place is only good for buying lots of pizzas for party’s coming out cheap.

name: Robert Posey
text: When I walked in the black man behind the counter just grunted. I shook it off and asked " hey, you doing ok today" nothing. I know it's loud and all plexiglass up but I said it and he heard it. Also the night before I wanted a    "Hot and ready" and they didn't have any hot and ready. Done not going to LC's again

name: James Deloe
text: Fast friendly cheap and good

name: James Witt
text: Sucked.....I feel cheap....5 dollars for disappointment

name: Hailley
text: Seems like my order is ALWAYS messed up anymore. The fella up front never gets the order right and the pizza looks terrible ! The only time my order is good anymore is when the lady manager is working during the day!

name: Skyvs van
text: I am a huge fan of Pizza Pizza! My family isn't. Recently my family went out of town and I was on my own. So of course I close Lottle Ceasar's. Getting a supreme with extra cheese. My fav. As I thought it was amazing. Then the next week I got that for myself and some cheesy bread and a pepperoni for the family. It was also amazing. Then tonight I got the same thing as last time and my supreme was really bad. I dont know what was added but it burned my mouth not by temperature but by spice. And the pepperoni pizza looked like it had been sitting there for hours. So disappointed some consistency would have been appreciated but I'm done

name: JOSH DRUMMOND
text: Good store. I'm just not a big fan of little Caesars pizza.

name: Sherry Rylander
text:
The Hot and Ready pizza is a wonderful idea. $5-$6, you walk in and get a hot pizza and walk out. Very seldom do we have to wait. The place is always clean the staff is always pleasant.
The newest addition is the thin crust pepperoni pizza. If you don’t like a lot of bread, it has just the right combination a crispy crust, the perfect amount of  sauce and lots of spicy pepperoni to make a very tasty meal. I like to dip it in ranch dressing myself. Get a large because you will eat the whole pizza.

name: Jeff Nations
text: This group of foreign workers are very rude!

name: Mizzuz Mo
text: Saturday, April 6 2019. My entire household got food poisoning from lil Caesars in Rainbow City. From the hubby to the baby. It was absolutely awful. Maybe 3 hours after eating... a little less. (Edited to spare you the details) And it was far worse for the adults. I ate for the first time today(2days later). No virus strikes the entire family simultaneously. It was definitely food poisoning.

name: Sarah Reaves
text: Pizza was great and the cashier even told me about their newest pizza. I can't wait to try it!

name: Chuck and Rachel
text: Love this place. Always quick and easy it never takes long, even if you stop in at rush time (5ish) and have to wait on your order, it's never no more than five minutes or so. I also love how sweet the boss (possibly the owner?) Is so sweet to my son. He always gives him a balloon and free cookies. He's always so kind and I've heard him asking his younger employees about their grades and encouraging them, which is very nice to see. I've never had an issue of any kind and they are open until 10 u Believe, which is also nice. It's in a super convenient location and when I use the app and preorder via the "pizza portal" it literally takes me two minutes to pick it up. If you need a budget friendly, convenient and quick dinner, this is it.

name: Lurae Morgan
text: Used pizza portal. Pizza was not ready. Had to tell women what I wanted. She said sometimes it Don't work.  Then they got pizza wrong.  And acted like it was my fault. And refused to give refund.  At that point I had been there over an hour and just wanted my money back did not want to wait 30 more minutes for wrong order.

name: dusty carroll
text: I bought pizza and crazy bread at around 5:15 tonight, and both tasted like they had been there since lunch. Horrible! Even had that sitting under a light for too long taste. Very disappointed!!

name: Thomas Gregerson
text:
The amount of time you spend at RBC location waiting for pizza has increased dramatically. When I order on their app and arrive when the app alerts me the pizza is ready, I would assume it is ready. No such luck. This is not a one time event.

Tried this place again and waited 30 minutes for cheese pizza, italian bread, and a 2 liter. Stay away unless you have all day. If I could give negative stars I would.

name: Dimika Bozeman
text: This particular location always had the best service but then they started letting the rude big man from East Gadsden come over there. We try our best to just not go when he is there. Outside of that  everyone is always very helpful and nice. They always have FRESH hot pizza ready. Most don't realize when you hear "hot and ready" that doesn't necessarily mean fresh. This location does it right! Btw their deep dish has that buttery bottom and crust that I haven't gotten with other locations.

name: Matthew Niessen
text: Surprisingly good for a budget pizza joint. Quick(ish), friendly, and never a mistake.

name: Richard Burleson
text: Fast friendly service. Like going there on weekends when I'm off work. Knowing that the wait won't be long if I order or just to pick up a ready made. Thanks 😊

name: Jake Samples
text: Never has the extra most bestest hot and ready pizza ready. Defeats the purpose of being called a hot and ready when it's never available

name: Courtney Turner
text: I've visited numerous little ceasars' restaurants and every time I get a bowl of grease, so much grease! I had to stop eating their pizza cause my stomach can't handle it, however they have good wings. When they have enough sauce anyway.

name: Kelly Slezak
text: Don't worry about calling in an order. It won't be ready. I called in a pizza and cheese bread, got the 30 minutes later and it wasn't ready. Had to wait another 10 minutes. This isn't the 1st this has happened. It seems to be a regular occurrence.

name: Marcus Davinport
text: Ordered by phone .got there and was told they sold my food because they did not know if I was coming.  Stupidity  at its finest.  You had my number. You told me it would be 15 minutes.  I got there in 17. Minutes.  Food is good. Not the best services.

name: MichaelDCash48
text: Very awesome service and the cashier was great 👍

text: Last several visits had to wait more than twenty minutes, one if these visits took 40 minutes to get pizza

name: Molly Waddell
text: Alway very busy.

name: Chatori Scott
text: A little slow but hey..thats every one I've been to

name: Amanda Stephens
text: 1 male in there is super rude.. first time I have ever seen him. We come often

name: Brittany Gray
text: Great

name: Samantha Strength
text: Made an order. Only have one other car in the parking lot. 30 minutes had to walk inside to see what happened. They had given my order to another in the parking lot. This place is terrible at not paying attention. I don't have this kind of trouble in Huntsville with Little Caesars.

name: Jade Hillis
text: Called in an order and picked it up at the drive thru. They were busy but, very nice and quick. Very organized.  Will definitely come back!

name: Amanda
text: I sat at the window 10-15 min, n no one c@me out to get my order or anything .. there wasn't a line, and one car in the parking lot, I seen people walking around inside just look at me ,n kept t@lking so, I left and spent double the price for a lot better service and pizza at Pappa Johns!!

name: Cheyanne Guerin
text: Waited over 30 minutes for a hot and ready pizza. It was about 230 on a Saturday afternoon. One car in the parking lot, was asked to pull forward. The cars behind me got multiple pizzas before I ever got any of our food. The wait times are ridiculous. When the pizza did get to me, it wasn't even hot and the box was all soggy.

name: Misty Rice
text: Pizzas are never ready ahead of time. They do not put right amount of toppings on pizzas, and they're sometimes burned. Management is rude, and disrespectful to costumers when there is a complaint.

name: Hanna Cranfield
text: The waiting times are ridiculous! There is no such thing as a hot and ready anything at this little ceasers. No matter what you want you will wait ATLEAST 25 minutes everytime. Cheesey bread.? 25 mins. Pizza..? 45 minutes. This is not a 1 time issue. It is every single time we have given it a chance.

name: Lisa Thompson
text: Fast, friendly service!! Best pizza for the price!

name: Deborah Taulbee
text: Hot pizza and polite, however I had to wait a while for my pizza in drive thu. They need to work on drive thru time.

name: Judy McLemore
text: Undoubtedly they don’t hire enough people to work.  Had to pull up to wait on my order.   Was told it would be about 8 minutes. It ended up taking 35 minutes. Not good business.

name: Nathan Haswell
text: Closed to early in my opinion it should be open  past 8 pm

name: Hannah Greczkowski
text: 10 minutes after I ordered they told me they had my order wrong another 10 minutes  to correct my order then another 10 to get my money back because my " hot and READY " pizza still was gonna take another 8 minutes  to cook.

name: Curtis Curcio
text: Great food and fast service.

name: Katelyn Fraley
text: Guy running register was very helpful and nice

name: Hannah Thomas
text:
Went by there around 7 PM,  which is supposedly their "Hot and Ready" window.  I waited over 40 minutes in the parking lot for a $5  pepperoni  pizza and crazy bread. If I'm not mistaken, don't all their various advertisements promise that it's supposed to be ready when you get there?  The entire parking lot was full of angry people waiting just as long as me.

I used to work at a different pizza chain and we'd have the pizzas made, put in the oven, and boxed up ready for pickup or delivery in 15 minutes.  Do they not have enough oven space for the amount of business they do?  Are they employees slow?  Whatever it is, the franchisee needs to do something about it.  This place is just pathetic.

name: Megan Bice
text: Extra most bestest pepperoni..more like extra most yummy

name: Dennis The Menace
text: Food was good. The cashier was friendly. However they do not seem to be on the same page as any of the other little Caesars restaurants that I have been to. When getting pizza I usually get a couple zap packs to put on my pie, but this location only offers a jar for purchase no packets like the rest of the USA. Also I ordered a stuffed crust which has always come with some kind crust flavor I believe it’s butter and garlic. The pizza I got from this location had a dry crust and when I asked he said he could put some butter on it but  he’s never heard of stuffed crust having the crust flavored. Also someone in the back was telling him that he needed to know that they charge for the butter on the crust. This location is just doing there own thing. This location not in line with other franchises I’ve been to.

name: Samantha Strength
text: Still waiting. Got my order in at 6:18.  It 6:53.

name: Julia Spear
text: Kids at drivethru window tried to charge me 3 different amounts..the final one still being too high but close...i was at drive thru for over 10 minutes to get a hot & ready.pizza... The pizza was lacking cheese & pepperoni on half the pizza ; was VERY burnt & black on the end & underneath & very hard! Have tried calling numerous times since yesterday afternoon just to get hung up on repeatedly when the phone is picked up...someone hangs up immediately as i am not.able to even hear a voice or talk to a manager let any1 else!

name: Samantha Strength
text: Still waiting. Got my order in at 6:18.  It 6:53.

name: BigCannon Entertainment
text: This trip went very well. Love the pretzel pizza and everything was very fresh

name: Leesa Grider
text: Pizza was fresh and hot and the employees were really friendly.

name: Regina Hillis
text: Called in 3 cheese bread at 2:50pm. They said it would be ready in 10 mins. I arrived at 3:10. Didnt receive my cheese bread until 3:22. And it wasn't even hot like it just came out of oven.

name: Kathryn Moody
text: First I was asked to wait a minute, she'd be right with me. 5 or so minutes later, I ordered 2 "Hot 'n Ready" pizzas. Paid the tab, that's when I was handed my card, no receipt. That's when I was also asked to pull up and wait 10 minutes. Turned into 15 plus. Don't stop here often but won't be coming  back. Too many other businesses are willing to take my money!

name: Kevin Meier
text: Always have to wait for food.

name: Lucky Friday
text:
I wish the staff would step their game up, they disappoint the city of scottsboro everyday.
Hot and ready is the slogan yet it is guaranteed you Will wait 30 minutes+ For any item; Anytime you visit this location.

name: Shaun Mclaughlin
text: Stop advertising hot and ready. It never is. It's just lies. I get lied to enough in life, I dont need a pizza joint to lie to me, too.

name: Team Keller Motorsports
text: If you live in Section or Dutton area, you're far better off driving the extra 20 miles to and from the Fort Payne store. Dissatisfaction is guarenteed every single time in every single way at the Scottsboro store. Has been that way for a very long time. This store is in terribly bad need for some new managment.

name: Destiny Harvey
text: Absolutely awful service. Order was taken incorrectly after repeating three separate times, was pulled up over 30 minutes then walked inside to see the employee handing out the same type of pizza I ordered though the window all while I waited. Waited another 20 minutes inside where I saw an employee raise his shirt up and scratch his back and immediately go back to touching pizzas without washing or sanitizing his hands. Worst Little Caesar's experience I have ever had.

name: LaBron Turner
text: The service is terrible. We seldom visit this location. My wife waited a very lengthy amount of time about a month ago to pick up 2 of the famous "Hot & READY" pizzas. She was given a card for a free pizza for her wait. We stopped back by this location on 10/11/2019 to pick up the free pizza and order a second. We waited 30 minutes for 2 pepperoni pizzas. I do not recommend this Little Caesar location.

name: Danielle's Journey Through 30's
text: As always ... what did I expect... food given away to another person then when I get my food, an hour later it's burnt and hardly no cheese.

name: xxxi rei
text:
Waiting about 20+ minutes Everytime we go, just to get greasy, droopy, awfully prepared food. Half the time, they don't even cut the pizza or cheesy bread, and when they do, it's uneven and sloppy.
Food used to be fantastic, but the quality has went down tremendously.

name: Richard Shelton
text: Good pizza, wait not bad when they busy

name: Ryan Lewis
text: We called in an order and they said it would be ready in 10 minutes so we continued to get there. Upon our arrival which was est 12 minutes to give them enough time and the guy said it was coming out to pull up and he would bring it out. So my buddy and I waited patiently seeing as there was a car in front of us. The same guy comes out to the front parking lot 2 spots from us to talk to people in a car cussing and carrying on, when another employee stuck her head out the window and hollered at him to say something about an order which in return he said our name to her saying it was just a call in it will be ok to wait a little longer. By this time we have been in their parking lot for 15 minutes now 27 minutes into this nightmare. A few more minutes later he goes back with one of the people from the car and that extra person went behind the counter with seemed like every employee there. Now almost 40 minutes and some other guy walks out and goes to 3 other vehicles then finally comes to us. Both orders of wings were cold cheesey bread cold and both pizzas cold. I'm sorry but wish would have chosen someone else for dinner. We will not be back

name: Banana-Queen
text:
You always have to wait, even for a regular $5 pepperoni.  But it is decent food for what you pay.  I've just accepted that I'll have to wait every single time.

EDIT:. Went in a week or so ago.  Heard an employee tell a customer that hot and ready only applies to the hours of 4 PM to 8PM.  So it's pretty much a lie.

name: Vassie Tiffin
text: Grate food fast service

name: Mikala Stubblefield
text: I’ve attempted to eat there 4 times in the past month and every time they say “it’ll be 15 to 20 minutes wait... is that ok?” Every time I say no and drive off! It’s very frustrating bc it’s suppose to b hot and ready!! I understand sometimes having to wait a few minutes but not 15 to 20!

name: David Barron
text: We placed an order and was told it would be ten to twenty minutes and they would bring it out. Well after sitting in the parking lot for fifty-five minutes and people who came in after we did getting their order I walked in and asked about my order. We we're parked right in front of the door. The girl behind the counter said she didn't see our red car. It was the only red car in the parking lot. We have more important things to do with our time. We will not be going back.

name: Scott Hamilton
text: They should really drop the “hot and ready” slogan. Pizzas are never ready.

name: George Locke
text: Everyone in there needs to be fired. Called in pizza. Said it would be ready in 20 minutes. Get there  parking lot is full. So i waited almost 15 minutes in drive through. 4 cars ahead of us. Finally the car in front of us gets an order. No money is exchanged. Pulls up goes in to the back area and starts chatting. Just so happens our order is gone and still ask us to pay and wait. Not only are they unprofessional rude but saw an employee steel something he put in his truck out back. So im sure this store looses alot of money. Hope they get new management

name: Crystal Ball
text: Every time I go there is always a parking lot full of people waiting on there pizza and I have to wait 20 to 25 minutes. So I decided to call beforehand and order. They said no problem we'll have in ready in 15 minutes.  I got there, they said oh, we are really busy, just look at our parks lot, it will be probably 20 to 25 minutes, why not have just told me that when I called that it would be 45 minutes

name: Jonathan Copeland
text: So, Hot n Ready isn’t true..... I’ve been waiting 22 minutes after I was told to wait 10 minutes in a parking space. 3 customers that came after me have gotten their pizza. I don’t mind waiting 10 minutes when she told me 10 minutes but I went in to check on my pizza and she said it was still in the oven. Upon my discontent she said she could refund my money but couldn’t give me my pizza. This is customer service at its finest. I’ll go to Marco’s. Same wait.

name: wendi raeuchle
text: Thank you Little Caesars, especially those team members working the morning of Wednesday, July 3.  Areas of our hospital flooded due to a steam pipe burst that activated the sprinkler system.  Our staff members were working tirelessly to help with the clean up, so we wanted to provide lunch for them.  We needed to feed quite a few people, and I was concerned that I would have to go to multiple restaurants in order to get enough food.  But thanks to the crew at LC, I was able to get everything I needed from them on this very large, spur-of-the-moment lunch order.  They were so professional and put my mind at ease, letting me know they do this kind of thing all the time.  What a relief!!!!  I knew they were  probably used to doing large orders at night, but I needed this food only about an hour after they opened.  Thank you Little Caesars team members for being a bright spot in our less than sunny day that day.

name: ethan lacey exe
text:
My husband and son waited 30 minutes on a pepperoni pizza & cheese pizza. This Is ridiculous!!!
They were busy as hell and only had 2 people working. Whoever is managing this so called pizza place needs to be fired! It use to be fast and friendly, no more, its slow and the employees are swamped and frustrated! Can't blame them! Get it together little Caesar, hire a manager that has s brain!!

name: semi proknife
text: Service was fast and friendly

name: Emmett O'neal
text: The food was hot and good but service was slacking. They wasn't very customer friendly. Kinda made me feel like I was a imposition.

name: Wanda McKee
text: Pizza was greasy and took forever 😡

name: Penny Bates
text: There motto is hot and ready. They need to change that!! They have cheap food so I went by there to get some for supper. The guy who waited on me said it would be about 15 minutes. I ended up waiting for 35 minutes for 2 pepporoni and 1 cheese pizzas. I don't know if the prices was worth the wait.

name: Natalie Slaton
text: The sauce doesn't taste the same as other Little Caesar's. Service is poor. Pizza is never hot, even when special ordered.

name: Kevin Worthington
text: Its little ceasers pizza, always have pretty good cheap pizza. My only complaint is they don't sell the white or orange cheese dip like they do at other ceasers pizza places. Idk why they don't but they should. Staff waz friendly.

name: Kent Patterson
text: Love their pizza

name: Emily Lay
text: Good employees but It is also the slowest lil Caesars I’ve been to. Every time I go to eat I have to go park and wait almost 30 min. Will never go back.

name: William Hamilton
text: Call in order told would be ready in 15min get there and a sign says CASH ONLY. They could of said something when I calle .

name: SilverDaddy
text: As always service is beyond horrific. Pull up to window after waiting 15 minutes in line. Wait another 15 as I’m watching employees walking by. Never once did someone come up and at least say “We’ll be with you shortly.” Last time for me at this pathetic excuse of a business. This franchise needs to be pulled from current ownership.

name: Manya Jeffers
text: Affordable and good pizza. Always hot pizza.

name: Amy Mansell
text: The customer service is nonexistent. The phone will ring forever and it's usually more than 5 minutes before you'll be greeted when you walk in. I am very surprised this company allows this kind of service. Very disappointing.

name: Brooke Martinez
text: Waited 1hour n 20 mins for just a cheese pizza and employees started fighting in the back. Pizza was burnt too.

name: Lisa Morton
text: Good prices good food but always have to wait

name: John Carlisle
text: You get what you pay for . That being said it's cheep and usually fast. But they do have a problem of selling the same pizza to three different people that can occasionally cause a backup and high wait time. Had to wait 30 minutes once because I ordered three different pizzas. Two were ready and while we waited for the third to cook they resold the two that were done to someone else so when our fresh pizza was done the other two were gone and we now had to wait for those two to cook and yes as you guessed while the other two cooked they resold the one we had waited for originally. They had to cook my order three times before we finally got all three pizzas.

name: Deanne Thompson
text: Make little Caesars hot and ready again. This place blows.

name: Caren Ross
text: Their prices are great and the pizza was good.

name: Austin Snell
text: Slow service and very unorganized. Hot N' Ready is definitely a lie. Waited over 20 minutes for a "Hot N' Ready".

name: Eric C. Stewart
text: Got the new thin crust pepperoni and cheese and it looks nothing like on tv. The edges of crust was burnt and it was a cracker crust with raised edges not flat. Pepperoni is very hot at least to me. Need to write down color of car because they come out searching for the person with the order and don't get the right person much.

name: S H
text: Been here about thirty times. Pizza quality is poor. Nothing is ever “ready.” Fairly cheap. Decent employees.

name: Lisa Waller
text: Ioved it

name: Vince King
text: Thought it was hot and ready, not hot in 10 minutes.

name: Pam Garner
text: Placed a large order on Monday for pick up on Wednesday. When I arrived to pick it up at the specified time, pizzas were not even in the oven.    Not pleased at all.

name: A N D R E S Mezu
text: I call trying to get my order fresh and ready by the time i got there but the Manager was VERY clever and say EVERYTHING is hot and ready to go...  But 20 minutes LATER i Still here waiting on a SIMPLE Pizza !!! Is this Pizza HUT??? What's taking so LONG.....

name: C H
text: Literally never hot nor ready to go. Even when they say the wait will max out at 12 minutes, you're looking at a minimum of 30. Staff is consistently unfriendly and food is meh at best. It's cheap, sure, but you'll ultimately wish you had gone somewhere else. I'd personally say not to waste your time and go somewhere else.

name: Jasonlee Gross Thornhill
text: Good hot pizza

name: Latricia Smith
text: Had the stuffed crust pizza and it was very good for the price 👍😁

name: Missy Wheeler
text: Scottsboro location  is a very big joke they lie and they do not do as they say they would do I ask to talk to a owner they back step and give me a number that is a non working number.

name: Penny Jones
text:
Place is a joke.
It wasn't hott or ready.

name: Zac Thompson
text: Hard to beat a $5 pizza as you can tell from the massive amount of people waiting every day. Expect to wait a while during peak hours.

name: Jonathan Lambert
text: I waited in the parking lot for 45 minutes for something that was supposed to be hot and ready

name: Brittney Turner
text: They just need to work on informing customers of the wait time for specialty pizza.

name: Scott abandoned
text: You want pizza cheap an fast, this is the place to go.an just because there fast dont think the quality is poor.there pizza is as good as pizza hut or dominoes. An half the price

name: C B
text: If i could leave zero stars i would! Waited 45 mins for a thin crust pizza was pulled up. 3 cars that came after me got their orders.  I went in requested my money back WITH THE RECEIPT  the rude manager claimed she couldn't find my order and acted like she didn't even wanna give me my money. I waited at least 15 more mins for a refund! This place needs new management.  The employees seem lost.  Never will i go back.

name: Eric Williamson
text: Deep dish pizza was unfinished and mostly raw dough and made it disgusting!

name: Hog Tide
text: The sign says hot and ready. "Ready" is the key word. Everytime I've stopped here it's been pull up and wait and the manager is clueless. Y'all get your act together or close it down this little Cesar's sucks

name: Ryan Heard
text: Hot n ready doesn't mean hot n pull up in a parking spot for 20 minutes smh

name: Steffany Grentz
text: Food is usually fast and always good. But front counter employees could use a manners class! I walked in stood at counter one employee rolled his eyes when I said hello how are you? The other employee ignored me for a few min! Hospitality goes a long way. 3 stars bc I like the pizza!

name: Darlene Hatton
text: Sadly their not as quick service as they once were. But still overall the pizza's for the price is satisfaction for our lil family :)

name: Kathy Smith
text: I think this Little Caesar in Scottsboro is the worst. You always have to wait. The pizza is NEVER hot and ready. Most of the time I just accept that fact and deal with it but today after waiting 20 minutes for my pizza, I got home and it was burnt to a crisp. Yes they will make it up but that doesn't help me at this moment with no pizza for the kids for lunch. You need to improve your time management and quit advertising hot and ready.

name: Buddy Baswell
text: Slowest place I have ever been too. Got 14 cars sitting outside waiting on pizzas and 6 people inside

name: Dennis Pendall Sr
text: Was 22 people waiting wrong order waited 45 min got right food when I said give back my money

name: James Clements
text: The stuffed crust with extra cheese was great

name: Kevin Mackey
text: Very good and very inexpensive.

name: Angela Frank (mustgaming1)
text: The last two times I have come they have no hot and ready pizzas ready. You have to pay then wait 20-30 minutes for them to bring you your food. Why don't they have the pizza ready like they advertise?

name: Keyanna Kerr
text: If you're patient and willing to wait a hour or more just for one "hot and ready" pizza and some bread sticks...They had so many people just up and left the wait was so long lol. Lesson learned here.

name: lisa jones
text: Can't handle being busy and can't keep their customer service orders straight. Served 2 customers that arrived after us before us and while waiting we saw three other patrons just leave with nothing. When we called to speak with the manager she fullblown argued with me.

name: Zane & Amber Beard
text: Food is always good and hot but the wait is a little bit too long.

name: Sabrina Bolt
text: The last sausage pizza had maybe 20 pieces of sausage on the whole pizza, was ridiculous, especially when you pay more for sausage. Will be making sure I never get a pizza like that again. If I didn't drive so far home, I would have taken it back.

name: Coty Corbin
text: Friendly staff and food always fresh and hot. Very good too.

name: Tim Saint
text: Hooked on the pizza with everything on it (supreme)

name: Faye Tilley
text: Hot n ready is a joke. I have waited up to 45 mins before on a call in order that I placed an hour before I would be there

name: Donna Day
text: The thin crust most bestest pepperoni didn't have the most cheese nor the most pepperoni.  It definitely wasn't the best six dollar pizza.

name: tyler mick
text: Nothing is ever Hot or Ready , very annoying honestly. And when I’m standing at the counter no reason I should have to go to the pizza portal to pickup my pizza when they could have just handed it to me

name: Darryl Shaffor
text: Took forever to get a hot and ready pizza and cheese sticks.

name: Raychul Faye
text: I absolutely love Little ceasers. There pizza tastes A-MAZ-ING, and the prices are REMARKABLE!!!! 👌🏻😋

name: Janice Faye
text: Fast service and $5 pizzas at the window

name: Elizabeth Smith
text: I love the price of everything! It's great pizza and wings and so much more. I definitely rate this 5 stars!

name: gary helson
text: Tried their new give meat pizza.  Worth the trip.

name: Cole Strawn
text: Website says they close at 11:00 P.M. but they close before 10, i think if your supposed to be open till 11 you should stay open till 11.

name: Christy Harding
text: Ordered and paid then  was asked to pull in and wait just a minute on order to finish cooking. So much for hot and ready! 30 minutes later, and  after everyone else was waited on, I drove to the window again and was asked for my  receip because  they couldn't find order in pc, and gave me a run around then finally got employee that took order to verify. When I finally got food it was COLD and not even a apology.

name: Robert Allison
text: Amazing that at anytime of day or night it seems the Little Caesars pizza in Scottsboro has a wait time averaging 20-30 minutes on hot and ready pizzas...Tonight I thought we'd try it again and it was a very slow night at little caesars yet here we are in the parking with 3 other cars waiting on our hot and ready order lol ...this little caesars is by far the slowest even when no one in the drive thru...

name: Scott Bryant
text: Took to long to get my order and the food was below par

name: J Nicole Evans
text: Not the best customer service. Several times waited over an hour for a pizza that I preordered which was a $5 pepperoni , in the meantime watching everyone who walks in after me and go thru the drive thru get their pizza which was a $5 pepperoni.

name: Robert Dorman
text: Good pizza if you're going for end of week cheap.

name: Michelle Sopha
text: Fast friendly service love it it's good food and it's at a good price

name: Melisa A Wiersma
text: Great if you don't mind waiting 20 minutes for the hot and ready pizza

name: malissa martin
text: VERY FRIENDLY AND PROMPT, DELICIOUS PIZZA!

name: Brandy Machen
text: They always have the $5 pizza ready and hot the only bad part about it is sometimes it's been in the warmer a little too long and gets a little too brown but other than that it's good and it's quick service and friendly people if you really want to go and try Fort Payne their pizzas are always perfect and even if you don't order the extra most best it still has super amounts of cheese on there

name: Emily Forsythe
text: Hot and ready my tail! Literally have to wait on a pepperoni pizza any time we stop by. Management really needs to do something about the wait times.

name: Greg D
text: It sucked as usual!!! Food is good... The time you always and I mean always have to wait is horrible!!!!!

name: Jeff Burgess
text:
Great service tonight November 5th 925pm very nice lady's working pizza was very fresh..
Thank you lady's this made trip back into middle Tennessee alot better.

name: michele taylor
text: I don't know what it is about this specific little caesars pizza location but they have the best little caesars pizza! I use to work for little caesars in Greenville SC many moons ago and the differences I have noticed is no corn meal on bottom of pizzas and they seem to be cooked longer which in my book is excellent because the pizzas are great! The only reason I did not give them a 5 is because every time we go we are tokd we have to wait 15 mins for the hot n ready and we end up waiting more like 25-30, sometimes even longer than that.  But,  it's always worth the wait!

name: Alex Webster
text: Not good, I had to wait 30 minutes for 2 'hot and  ready' pepperoni pizzas

name: Stacy Powell
text: Good pizza...service was slacking

name: Christy Harding
text: Ordered and paid then  was asked to pull in and wait just a minute on order to finish cooking. So much for hot and ready! 30 minutes later, and  after everyone else was waited on, I drove to the window again and was asked for my  receip because  they couldn't find order in pc, and gave me a run around then finally got employee that took order to verify. When I finally got food it was COLD and not even a apology.

name: Gerry Lynn Cooper
text:
Wonderful customer service!
Last visit was greeted with a Big Smile, and felt welcome.

name: Glenda Hutson
text: This little Caesars pizza has progressively gotten worse.  The crust is thick on one side and thin on the other.  They put very little cheese on they seem to always be burnt on the top.  Forget about getting cheese pizza cause it won't happen.  I'm going to start going to Marco's pizza or Domino's pizza in the future.

name: Greg D
text: It sucked as usual!!! Food is good... The time you always and I mean always have to wait is horrible!!!!!

name: F and P Farms
text: The management is rude,and will stand in the back talking very loudly about other customers and employees, I'm stand in there thinking like maybe you shouldn't work with the public. Cashisers are rude, pizza crust was hard as a rock... like it has been setting for a while, our crazy bread was raw dough. They charged extra for crazy bread sauce even tho it says it comes with it.

name: Stacy Powell
text: Good pizza...service was slacking

name: Duran Duran
text: Fresh pizza but had to wait too long for it.

name: Jody Shaw
text: Only reason for one star is because couldn't go lower order was called in then sold had to wait for more to be cooked then sit 20 more minutes only to find out they forgot to put the cheese sticks in poor management and poor workers

name: Josh Harbin (Josh)
text: Good but very slow 🐌

name: Chantel Wade
text: I have always loved Little Caesars and I usually go there for pizza but when they put employees in peril in order to make an extra buck then no more.  No amount of money is worth someone getting hurt.  I will stick with a company who values their employees.

name: Ashlyn Mitchell
text: Just so everyone knows, the manager there is not a good manager. He treats his employees like they're nothing, except for one and that's because they're messing around. He lets her get away with threatening other employees and going off on other employees so she can get her way. He even fired one of his best workers because she told him to or else she was going to quit. Even customers have complained about this yet nothing gets done about it. When I worked there I asked him for the store owners number and he denied to give it to me because I was going to let him know what all has been going on. Everyone who has ever tried to do something about this situation has got fired or else ended up having to quit. And this is just some of few things that goes on there. I'm putting this because I hope someone sees this and I hope something gets done about this.
